GP12garup2_u:3031: svaṃ veśma punarāgatya mitrasthāne viśanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3038: pibanti te ca pānīyaṃ bhojanocchiṣṭayojitam // GarP_2,20.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3041: kathaṃ kurvanti te pretāḥ kena rūpeṇa kasya kim /
GP12garup2_u:3042: jñāyate kena vidhinā jalpanti na vadanti vā // GarP_2,20.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3043: enaṃ chindhi manomohaṃ mama cedicchasi priyam /
GP12garup2_u:3044: kalikāle hṛṣīkeśa pretatvaṃ jāyate bahu // GarP_2,20.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3047: jīvansa dṛśyate snehī mṛto duṣṭatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3049: satyavāk priyavādī ca na pretaiḥ sa hi pīḍyate // GarP_2,20.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3053: kṛtādau dvāparānte ca na preto naiva pīḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:3058: virodho bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ pretadoṣeṇa kāśyapa // GarP_2,20.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3064: syāddhantakalaho nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3068: paradravyāṇāṃ ca hartā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3070: loke kalahakārī ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3072: pretapīḍā tu sā jñeyā satyaṃsatyaṃ khageśvara // GarP_2,20.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3073: hīnajātyā ca sambandho hīnakarma karoti yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3074: adharme ramate nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3078: jāyā saṃpīḍhyate yacca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3080: abhāvo jāyate dharme sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3082: pratyakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3085: strīṇāṃ garbhavināśaḥ syānna puṣpaṃ dṛśyate tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3086: bālānāṃ maraṇaṃ yatra sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3088: svayameva na kurvīta sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3089: tīrthe gattvā parāsaktaḥ svakṛtyaṃ ca parityajet /
GP12garup2_u:3090: dharmakārye na sampattiḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3092: paradrohe matiścaiva sā pīḍā pretasaṃbhavā // GarP_2,20.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3093: puṣpaṃ yatra na dṛśyena phalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3094: viraho bhāryayā yatra sā pīḍā pretasagbhavā // GarP_2,20.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3095: yeṣāṃ vai jāyate cihnaṃ sadoccāṭaparaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:3096: svakṣetre niṣphalaṃ tejaḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.39 //
GP12garup2_u:3098: na prītirnāpi saukhyaṃ ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3099: pitṛvākyaṃ na kurute svapatnīṃ ca na sevate /
GP12garup2_u:3100: sadā krūramatirvyagraḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3104: pretatvaṃ jāyate tārkṣya pīḍyante yena jantavaḥ // GarP_2,20.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3106: yo vai na manyate pretānmṛtaḥ pretatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.44 //
GP12garup2_u:3107: pretadoṣaḥ kule yasya sukhaṃ tasya na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:3109: tṛtīye pañcame puṃsi vaṃśacchedo hi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3111: ye kecitpetarūpā vikṛtamukhadṛśo raudrarūpāḥ karālā manyante naiva gotraṃ sutaduhitṛpitṝn bhrātṛjāyāṃ vadhūṃ vā /
GP12garup2_u:3112: kṛtvā kāmyaṃ ca rūpaṃ sukhagatirahitā bhāṣamāṇā yatheṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭaṃ bhoktukāmā vidhivaśapatitāḥ saṃsmaranti svapākam // GarP_2,20.47 //
GP12garup2_u:3113: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretāvāsatadbādhāprakāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3118: yanmuktau ca manuṣyāṇāṃ na pīḍā jāyate punaḥ // GarP_2,21.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3120: teṣāṃ kadā bhavenmuktiḥ pretatvaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,21.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3121: pretatve hi pramāṇaṃ ca kati varṣāṇi saṃkhyayā /
GP12garup2_u:3124: muktiṃ prāyanti te pretāstadahaṃ kathayāmi te /
GP12garup2_u:3125: yadaiva manujo 'vaiti mama pīḍā kṛtā tviyam // GarP_2,21.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3127: svapne dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vṛkṣaḥ phalitaścūtacampakaḥ // GarP_2,21.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3128: vipro vā vṛṣabho devo bhramate tīrthago yadi /
GP12garup2_u:3129: evaṃ dṛṣṭo yadā svapno mṛtaḥ ko 'pisvagotrajaḥ // GarP_2,21.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3133: dharmāpāyaṃ prakurute pretapīḍā tadā vrajet // GarP_2,21.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3134: tadā tatra vināśāya cittabhaṅgaṃ karoti sā /
GP12garup2_u:3136: aśreyasi pravṛtti ca prerayanti punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3137: uccāṭanaṃ ca krūratvaṃ sarvaṃ pretakṛtaṃ khaga // GarP_2,21.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3139: tasya karmaphalaṃ sādhu pretavṛttiśca śāśvatī // GarP_2,21.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3140: sa bhavettena muktastu dattaṃ śreyaskaraṃ param /
GP12garup2_u:3141: svayaṃ tṛpyati bhoḥ pakṣinyasyoddeśena dīyate // GarP_2,21.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3142: śṛṇu satyamidaṃ tārkṣya yaddadāti bhunakti saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3143: ātmānaṃ śreyasā yuñjyātpretastṛptiṃ ciraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,21.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3145: ajñātayastu ye duṣṭāḥ pīḍayanti svavaṃśajān // GarP_2,21.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3148: sadā bandhuṣu yacchanti vṛddhimṛddhiṃ khagādhipa // GarP_2,21.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3150: na prāpayati mūḍhātmā pretaśāpaiḥ sa lipyate // GarP_2,21.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3153: evaṃ bruvanti te pretāḥ punaryābhyaṃ samāśritāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3156: nāma gotraṃ na dṛśyeta pratītirnaiva jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3158: na svapnaścaiṣṭitaṃ naiva darśanaṃ na kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:3159: kiṃ kartavyaṃ suraśreṣṭha tatra me brūhi niścitam // GarP_2,21.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3164: kṛtvā kṛṣṇabaliṃ caiva puraścaraṇa pūrvakam // GarP_2,21.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3166: kṛtena tena vighnāni vinaśyanti khageśvara // GarP_2,21.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3169: vimuktaḥ sarvapīḍābhya iti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,21.24 //
GP12garup2_u:3172: navame daśame varṣe pikṣuddeśena vai pumān /
GP12garup2_u:3173: gāyattrīmayutaṃ japtvā daśāṃśena ca homayet // GarP_2,21.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3180: anyā yā devatā loke na dehaprabhavo hi tāḥ // GarP_2,21.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3182: deho datto hi yenaivaṃ ko 'nyaḥ pūjyatamastataḥ // GarP_2,21.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3184: tatsarvamātmanā bhuṅkte dānaṃ vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,21.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3186: tasmātputtra iti prokta iha cāpi paratra ca // GarP_2,21.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3190: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi pretacihnaṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,21.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3191: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde svapnādhyāyo nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3195: sambhavanti kathaṃ pretāḥ kena teṣāṃ gatirbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3196: kīdṛkteṣāṃ bhavedrūpaṃ bhojanaṃ kiṃ bhavetprabho // GarP_2,22.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3197: suprītāste kathaṃ pretāḥ kva tiṣṭhanti sureśvara /
GP12garup2_u:3198: prasannaḥ kṛpayā deva praśramenaṃ vadasva me // GarP_2,22.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3201: jāyante te mṛtāḥ pretāstāñchṛṇuṣva vadāmyaham // GarP_2,22.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3203: prapāṃ sadma suvṛkṣāṃśca tathā bhojanaśālikāḥ // GarP_2,22.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3207: karṣayanti ca ye lobhātpretāste vai bhavanti hi // GarP_2,22.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3217: rajasvalādidoṣaiśca na ca bhūmau matāśca ye // GarP_2,22.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3219: sūtakaiḥ śvādisaṃparkaiḥ pretabhāvā iha kṣitau // GarP_2,22.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3221: te sarve pretayonisthā vicaranti marusthale // GarP_2,22.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3222: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3223: adṛṣṭadoṣāṃ tyajati sa preto jāyatedhruvam // GarP_2,22.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3227: viśvāsaghātī krūrastu sa preto jāyate dhruvam // GarP_2,22.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3235: kena vā mucyate kasmāttanme brūhi pitāmaha /
GP12garup2_u:3236: yacchrutvā na punarmohamevaṃ yāsyā mi suvrata // GarP_2,22.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3238: yenaiva jāyate preto yenaiva sa vimucyate /
GP12garup2_u:3239: prāpnoti narakaṃ ghoraṃ dustaraṃ daivatairapi // GarP_2,22.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3242: śrūyate hi purā vatsa brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsitavrataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3243: nāmnā santaptakaḥ khyāta stapor'the vanamāśritaḥ // GarP_2,22.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3246: yajansa sakalānyajñānyuktyā kālaṃ ca vikṣipan // GarP_2,22.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3253: bahūnyabdāni vijane vane tasya gatāni vai /
GP12garup2_u:3254: tasya buddhistato jātā tīrthānugamanaṃ prati // GarP_2,22.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3259: dadarśādhvani gacchansa pañca pretān sudāruṇān // GarP_2,22.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3264: papraccha madhurābhāṣī ke yūyaṃ vikṛtānanāḥ // GarP_2,22.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3265: kiñcāśubhaṃ kṛtaṃ karma yena prāptāḥ stha vaikṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:3266: kathaṃ vā caikataḥ karma prasthitāḥ kutra niścitam // GarP_2,22.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3268: svaiḥ svaistu karmabhiḥ prāptaṃ pretatvaṃ hi dvijottama /
GP12garup2_u:3271: hatavākyā hataśrīkā hata saṃjñā vicetasaḥ // GarP_2,22.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3272: na jānīmo diśaṃ tāta vidiśaṃ cātiduḥ khitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3273: kva nu gacchāmahe mūḍhāḥ piśācāḥ karmajā vayam // GarP_2,22.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3274: na mātā na pitāsmākaṃ pretatvaṃ karmabhiḥ svakaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3275: prāptāḥ sma sahasā jātaduḥ khodvegasamākulam // GarP_2,22.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3281: evaṃ nāmnā ca sarve vai saṃprāptāḥ pretatāṃ vayam /
GP12garup2_u:3286: mayā svādu sadā bhuktaṃ dattaṃ paryuṣitaṃ dvija // GarP_2,22.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3287: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai /
GP12garup2_u:3289: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai /
GP12garup2_u:3297: tena karmavipākena lekhako nāma cocyate // GarP_2,22.45 //
GP12garup2_u:3298: pretatvaṃ karmabhāvena prāptaṃ nāmāni ca dvija /
GP12garup2_u:3304: sarve ca vikṛtākārā lamboṣṭhā vikṛtānanāḥ // GarP_2,22.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3306: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ pretatve kāraṇaṃ mayā // GarP_2,22.49 //
GP12garup2_u:3307: jñānino 'pi vayaṃ sarve jātāḥ sma tava darśanāt /
GP12garup2_u:3308: yatra te śravaṇe śraddhā tatpṛccha kathayāmi te // GarP_2,22.50 //
GP12garup2_u:3313: yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā āhārāṇāṃ dvijottama /
GP12garup2_u:3314: asmākaṃ tu mahībhāga śṛṇutvaṃ susamāhitaḥ // GarP_2,22.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3320: yacchrutvā garhase brahman bhūyobhūyaśca garhitam // GarP_2,22.54 //
GP12garup2_u:3322: ucchiṣṭaiścaiva cānyaiśca pretānāṃ bhojanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,22.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3324: malināni prasūtāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.56 //
GP12garup2_u:3325: nāsti satyaṃ gṛhe yatra na śaucaṃ na ca saṃyamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3326: patitairdasyubhiḥ saṅgaḥ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.57 //
GP12garup2_u:3328: svādhyāya vratahīnāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3329: na lajjā na ca maryādā yadātra strījito gṛhī /
GP12garup2_u:3330: guravo yatra pūjyā na pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3331: yatra lobhastathā krodho nidrā śoko bhayaṃ madaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3332: ālasyaṃ kalaho nityaṃ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.60 //
GP12garup2_u:3333: bhartṛhīnā ca yā nārī paravīryaṃ niṣevate /
GP12garup2_u:3334: bījaṃ mūtrasamāyurkta pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai // GarP_2,22.61 //
GP12garup2_u:3335: lajjā me jāyate tāta vadato bhojanaṃ svakam /
GP12garup2_u:3336: yatstrīrajo yonigataṃ pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai // GarP_2,22.62 //
GP12garup2_u:3338: yathā na bhavitā pretastanme vada tapodhana /
GP12garup2_u:3339: nityaṃ mṛtyurvaraṃ jantoḥ pretatvaṃ mā bhavetkvacit // GarP_2,22.63 //
GP12garup2_u:3342: vrataiśca vividhaiḥ pūto na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3344: aparaiḥ sukṛtaiḥ pūto na preto na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3348: vidyādo 'bhayadaścaiva na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.67 //
GP12garup2_u:3349: śūdrānnena tu bhuktena jaṭharasthena yo mṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3350: durmṛtyunā mṛto yaśca sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.68 //
GP12garup2_u:3352: kārubhiśca rato nityaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.69 //
GP12garup2_u:3354: ajñānādbhakṣayanmāṃsaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.70 //
GP12garup2_u:3355: devadravyaṃ ca brahmasvaṃ gurudravyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3356: kanyāṃ dadāti śulkena sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.71 //
GP12garup2_u:3357: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3363: hartā hemnaśca bhūmeśca sa predṛ // GarP_2,22.74 //
GP12garup2_u:3365: evaṃ bruvati vai vipre ākāśe dundubhisvanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3368: svargaṃ gatā vimānaiste divyaiḥ saṃpṛcchya taṃ munim // GarP_2,22.76 //
GP12garup2_u:3374: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe bhīṣma yudhiṣṭhirasaṃvāde pretatvotpattitanmuktipeñcapretopākhyāna nirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3379: vadanti vā kadācitkiṃ tadvadasva sureśvara // GarP_2,23.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3381: teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi cihnaṃ svapnaṃ yathātatham /
GP12garup2_u:3384: tatra yacchanti liṅgāni darśayanti khageśvara // GarP_2,23.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3386: hayo gajo vṛṣo martyodṛśyate vikṛtānanaḥ // GarP_2,23.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3387: śayānaṃ viparītaṃ tu ātmānaṃ ca viparyayam /
GP12garup2_u:3389: svapne narau hi nigaḍairbadhyate bahudhā yadi /
GP12garup2_u:3390: annaṃ ca yācate svapne kuveṣaḥ pūrvajo mṛtaḥ // GarP_2,23.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3392: ātmanastu paro vāpi tṛṣārtastu jalaṃ pibet // GarP_2,23.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3394: utpatya gaganaṃ yāti tīrthe yāti kṣudhāturaḥ // GarP_2,23.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3396: liṅge gaje tathā deve bhūte prete niśācare // GarP_2,23.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3398: svakalatraṃ svabandhuṃ vā svasutaṃ svapatiṃ vibhum /
GP12garup2_u:3400: yācate yaḥ paraṃ svapne kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ ca pariplutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3403: pitā bhrātā kalatraṃ ca pretadoṣaistu paśyati // GarP_2,23.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3405: kṛtvā snānaṃ gṛhe tīrthe śrīvṛkṣe tarpaṇaṃ jalaiḥ // GarP_2,23.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3409: paṭhate śṛṇute vāpi pretacihnaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,23.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3410: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakṛtitaduktitaccihnatadvimuktyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3415: kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyopi vā // GarP_2,24.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3417: vedairuktaṃ tu yadvākyaṃ śataṃ jīvati mānuṣe // GarP_2,24.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3418: jīvanti mānuṣe loke sarve varṇā dvijātayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3420: na dṛśyate kalau tacca kasmāddeva samādiśa /
GP12garup2_u:3424: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3427: kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyo 'pi vā // GarP_2,24.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3429: sādhusādhu mahāprājña yastvaṃ bhakto 'si me priyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3432: tato vakṣyāmi pakṣīndra kāśyapeya mahādyute // GarP_2,24.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3434: vikarmaṇaḥ prabhāveṇa śīghraṃ cāpi vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3445: prāpayanti vaśaṃ mṛtyostato yāti ca yātanām /
GP12garup2_u:3446: svakarmāṇi parityajya mukhyavṛttāni yāni ca // GarP_2,24.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3450: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homo svādhyāyo davartāccanam // GarP_2,24.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3451: yasmindine na sevyante sa vṛthā divaso nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:3454: yatprātaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ sāyaṃ nūnamannaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3456: gataṃ jñātvā tu pakṣīndra vapurardhaṃ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,24.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3462: anekabhavasambhūtaṃ pātakaṃ tu tridhā kṛtam // GarP_2,24.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3463: yadā prāpnoti mānuṣyaṃ tadā sarvaṃ tapatyapi /
GP12garup2_u:3470: na jānātiḥ khagaśreṣṭha bālabhāvaṃ samāśritaḥ // GarP_2,24.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3471: yauvane timirāndhaśca yaḥ paśyati sa muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:3472: ādhānānmṛtyumāpnoti bālo vā sthaviro yuvā // GarP_2,24.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3475: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3477: vinā mānupadehaṃ tu sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,24.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3481: yoniṃ pūrayate yasmānmṛto 'pyāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,24.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3484: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā garuḍo vākyamabravīt // GarP_2,24.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3488: kathaṃ kiṃ kena dātavyaṃ mṛtānte ko vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3491: yadi garbho vipadyate stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3494: tato jāte vipanne tu ā cūḍākaraṇācchiśoḥ // GarP_2,24.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3495: dugdhaṃ bhojyaṃ tāśakti bālānāṃ ca pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:3496: ā cūḍātpañcavarṣe tu dehadāho vidhīyate // GarP_2,24.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3497: dugdhaṃ tasya pradeyaṃ syādbālānāṃ bhojanaṃ śubham /
GP12garup2_u:3500: dātavyaṃ tu khagaśreṣṭha ṛṇasambandhakastu saḥ // GarP_2,24.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3501: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyurdhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:3506: purāṇe gīyate gāthā sarvathā pratibhāti me // GarP_2,24.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3507: miṣṭānnaṃ bhojanaṃ deyaṃ dāne śaktistu durlabhā /
GP12garup2_u:3513: pāpaprabhāvānnarakaṃ prayāti punardaridraḥ punareva pāpī // GarP_2,24.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3514: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'lpāyurmaraṇahe tubālāntyeṣṭyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3519: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi pañcavarṣādhiko 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3520: pūrṇe tu pañcame varṣe pumāṃścaiva pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3524: garbhe naṣṭe kriyā nāsti dugdhaṃ deyaṃ mṛte śiśau /
GP12garup2_u:3525: paraṃ ca pāyasaṃ kṣīraṃ dadyādvalavipattitaḥ // GarP_2,25.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3529: bāle vā taruṇe vṛddhe ghaṭo bhavati vai mṛte // GarP_2,25.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3531: tataḥ paraṃ khagaśreṣṭha dehadāho vidhoyate // GarP_2,25.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3537: ā pañca varṣātkaumāraḥ paugaṇḍo navahāṃyanaḥ // GarP_2,25.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3539: mṛto 'pi pañcame varṣe avṛtaḥ savṛto 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3545: brahmabījodbhavāḥ putrā devarṣoṇāṃ ca vallabhāḥ // GarP_2,25.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3547: bālo vṛddho yubā vāpi ghaṭamicchanti dehinaḥ // GarP_2,25.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3548: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ sadā vetti dehī vai sarvagastviha /
GP12garup2_u:3551: tasmāddeyāni dānāni mṛte bāle suniścitam // GarP_2,25.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3555: dvādaśe hani samprāpte kuryācchrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,25.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3562: yadā nakriyate sarvaṃ mudgalatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,25.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3563: vratātprāṅgeva deyaṃ tu tataḥ pitṛgaṇasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:3566: apasavyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ kṛte yānti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,25.24 //
GP12garup2_u:3570: ghaṭādiṣu pṛthak sarvaṃ paśya rūpaṃ ca tatsamam // GarP_2,25.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3572: yā yasya prakṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ śukraśoṇitasaṅgame // GarP_2,25.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3576: sadṛśaḥ ko 'pi loke 'sminna bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,25.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3577: andhādandho na bhavati mūkānmūko na jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3579: anurūpā na dṛśyante madīyaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,25.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3582: saṃgṛhītaḥ suto yastu dāsīputtraśca tena kim // GarP_2,25.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3584: bhavenna duhitā yasya na dauhitro na vā sutaḥ // GarP_2,25.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3585: śrāddhaṃ tasya kathaṃ kāryaṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3587: mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu putrasya mucyate paitṛkādṛṇāt // GarP_2,25.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3589: lokānantyaṃ divaḥ prāptiḥ puttrapauttra prapauttrakaiḥ // GarP_2,25.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3592: kurvantyanye sutāḥ śrāddhame koddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam /
GP12garup2_u:3594: śrāddhaṃ sāṃvatsaraṃ kurvañjāyate narakāya vai // GarP_2,25.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3596: saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ kuryādekoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam // GarP_2,25.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3597: pratyabdaṃ pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ śrāddhaṃ dattvā na lipyate /
GP12garup2_u:3598: ekoddiṣṭaṃ parityajya pārvaṇaṃ kurute yadi // GarP_2,25.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3603: saṃgṛhītasuto bhūtvā pākaṃ vā yaḥ prayacchati // GarP_2,25.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3608: yastu pravrajitājjāto brāhmaṇyāṃ śūdrataśca yaḥ // GarP_2,25.42 //
GP12garup2_u:3611: taiḥ suvṛttaiḥ sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ kuvṛttairnarakaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:3615: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dhamakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasavāde mṛtabālāntyeṣṭibhinnābhinnasutakṛtāntyeṣṭyorvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3619: satyaṃ brūhi suraśreṣṭha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mayi prabho /
GP12garup2_u:3620: mṛtānāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ kadā kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3621: sapiṇḍatve kuto yānti asapiṇḍe kuto gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3626: agnyārohe kathaṃ śrāddhaṃ vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,26.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3628: kathayasva prasādena hītāya jagatāṃ prabho // GarP_2,26.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3632: sapiṇḍane tato vṛtte pitṛlokaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:3637: sahapiṇḍe kṛte pretastato yāti parāṃ gatim /
GP12garup2_u:3638: tannāma samparityajya tataḥ pitṛgaṇo bhavet // GarP_2,26.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3641: vivāhaṃ naiva kurvīta mṛte ca gṛhamedhini /
GP12garup2_u:3647: niragnikaḥ sāgniko vā dvādaśāhe sapiṇḍayet // GarP_2,26.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3648: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe vā ṣaṇmāse vatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3657: etaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ preto muktastu jāyate // GarP_2,26.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3659: yāvajjīva ca sadbhatryā na kuryātsahapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,26.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3662: āsurādivivā heṣu yā vyūḍhā kanyakā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3665: puttrābhāve tu patnī syātpatnyabhāve sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,26.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3666: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputtro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GP12garup2_u:3669: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ putrahīne nare khaga // GarP_2,26.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3671: sarvete tena putreṇa putriṇo manurabravīt // GarP_2,26.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3679: ye sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pretāsteṣāṃ na syātpṛthak kriyā // GarP_2,26.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3680: sapiṇḍane kṛte vatsa pṛthaktvaṃ tu vigarhitam /
GP12garup2_u:3681: yastu kuryātpṛthak piṇḍaṃ pitṛhā so 'bhijāyate // GarP_2,26.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3683: pṛthak piṇḍe kṛte paścātpunaḥ kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3685: ātmānaṃ ca tathā pretaṃ sa nayeddamaśāsanam // GarP_2,26.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3687: ghaṭādi bhojanaṃ nityaṃ padadānāni yāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:3688: sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte ekasyaiva tu dāpayet // GarP_2,26.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3692: divyadeho vimānasthaḥ sukhaṃ yāti yamālayam // GarP_2,26.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3693: jīvamāne ca pitari na hi puttre sapiṇḍatā /
GP12garup2_u:3694: strīṇāṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ nāsti tathā bhartari jīvati // GarP_2,26.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3696: tasyā bhartṛdine kāryaṃ vṛṣotsargādikaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,26.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3700: putreṇaiva pṛthak śrāddhaṃ kṣayākhye tasya vāsare // GarP_2,26.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3702: pṛthak śrāddhāni kurvīta sāpiḍyaṃ patinā saha // GarP_2,26.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3703: pṛthakpṛthak ca piṇḍena dampatī patinā saha /
GP12garup2_u:3704: na lipyate mahādoṣairetatsatyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,26.42 //
GP12garup2_u:3710: ekagotre mṛtānāṃ tu striyā vā puruṣasya vā /
GP12garup2_u:3714: ekenaiva tu pākena śrāddhāni kurute sutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3716: tīrthe cāparapakṣe vā candrasūryagrahe 'pi vā // GarP_2,26.47 //
GP12garup2_u:3718: agnirdahati gātrāṇi ātmānaṃ naiva pīḍayet // GarP_2,26.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3719: dahyate dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malam /
GP12garup2_u:3720: tathā nārī daheddehaṃ hutāśe hyamṛtopame // GarP_2,26.49 //
GP12garup2_u:3722: taptatailena lohena vahninā naiva dahyate // GarP_2,26.50 //
GP12garup2_u:3723: tathā sā patisaṃyuktā dahyate na kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:3726: bhartṛlokaṃ na sā yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,26.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3728: mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajya sā ciraṃ sukhamedhate // GarP_2,26.53 //
GP12garup2_u:3730: tāvatkālaṃ vasetsvarge nakṣatraiḥ saha sarvadā // GarP_2,26.54 //
GP12garup2_u:3731: tadante carate loke kule bhavati bhoginām /
GP12garup2_u:3732: sā hi labdhamahāprītirbhartrā saha pativratā // GarP_2,26.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3733: evaṃ na kurute nārī dharmoḍhā patisaṃgamam /
GP12garup2_u:3735: valgulī gṛhasodhā vā godhā vā dvimukhī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3738: manasā karmaṇā vācā mṛtaṃ jīvantameva vā // GarP_2,26.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3739: jīvamāne mṛte vāpi kilbiṣaṃ kurute tu yā /
GP12garup2_u:3740: sa ca vaidhavyamāpnoti janmajanmani durbhagā // GarP_2,26.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3743: evaṃ kṛte khagaśreṣṭha pitṛloke ciraṃ vaset /
GP12garup2_u:3746: pativratā yathā nārī bhartṛduḥkhaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,26.62 //
GP12garup2_u:3750: punaḥ kuryātsadā nityaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pratimāsikam // GarP_2,26.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3752: yaḥ karoti naraḥ kaścitkṛt pūrvaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,26.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3754: pratimāsaṃ ghaṭā deyā sodanā jalapūritāḥ // GarP_2,26.66 //
GP12garup2_u:3755: arvākca vṛddheḥ karaṇācca tārkṣya sapiṇḍanaṃ yaḥ kurute hi putraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3756: tathāpi māsaṃ pratipiṇḍamekamannaṃ ca kumbhaṃ sajalaṃ ca dadyāt // GarP_2,26.67 //
GP12garup2_u:3757: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍedvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe sapiṇḍananirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3761: kathaṃ pretā vasantyatra kīdṛgrūpā bhavanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3764: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena ca śubhe na ca /
GP12garup2_u:3765: tanme kathaya deveśa mama cedicchasi priyam // GarP_2,27.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3767: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tārkṣya mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3770: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābāho tena te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,27.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3780: vanamadhye tadā rājā mṛgaṃ dūrādapaśyata // GarP_2,27.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3781: tena viddho mṛgo 'tīva bāṇena sudṛḍhena ca /
GP12garup2_u:3782: bāṇamādāya taṃ tasya sa vane 'darśanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3798: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ vismito babhruvāhanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3799: preto 'pi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ghorāmaṭavīmāgataṃ nṛpam // GarP_2,27.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3801: abravītsa tadā tārkṣya pretarājo nṛpaṃ vacaḥ // GarP_2,27.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3802: pretabhāvo mayā tyaktaḥ prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup2_u:3806: kathayasva mama prītyā yathaivaṃ cāsi tattvataḥ // GarP_2,27.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3807: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā provāca sakalaṃ svakam // GarP_2,27.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3810: pretatve kāraṇaṃ śrutvā dayāṃ kartuṃ mamārhasi // GarP_2,27.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3815: vaiśyo jātyā sudevo 'haṃ nāmnā viditamastu te // GarP_2,27.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3821: yathā me niṣphalaṃ jātaṃ sukṛtaṃ tadvadāmi te // GarP_2,27.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3822: na me 'sti santatistāta na suhṛnna ca bāndhavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3823: na ca mitraṃ hi me tādṛgyaḥ kuryādaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,27.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3824: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tena mama jātaṃ nṛpottama /
GP12garup2_u:3826: pratimāsyāni cānyāni evaṃ śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,27.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3828: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,27.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3830: varṇānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ rājā bandhurihocyate // GarP_2,27.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3831: tanmāṃ tāraya rājendra maṇiratnaṃ dadāmi te /
GP12garup2_u:3833: tathā kāryaṃ mahābāho kṛpā yadi mayīṣyate /
GP12garup2_u:3837: piśācāśca bhavantīha karmabhiḥ kaiśca tadvada // GarP_2,27.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3840: ye haranti nṛpaśreṣṭha pretayoniṃ vrajanti te // GarP_2,27.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3841: tāpasīṃ ca sagotrāṃ ca agamyāṃ ye bhajanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:3842: bhavanti te mahāpretā ambujāni haranti ye // GarP_2,27.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3851: kathaṃ muktā bhavantīha pretatvāttvaṃ ca te 'pi ca /
GP12garup2_u:3853: vidhinā kena tatkāryaṃ sarvametadvadasva me // GarP_2,27.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3858: ato vakṣyāmi te viṣṇupūjāṃ pretatvanāśinīm // GarP_2,27.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3863: pūrve tu śrīdharaṃ devaṃ dakṣiṇe madhusūdanam /
GP12garup2_u:3864: paścime vānamaṃ devamuttare ca gadādharam // GarP_2,27.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3865: madhye pitāmahaṃ pūjya tathā devaṃ maheśvaram /
GP12garup2_u:3868: ghṛtena dadhnā kṣīreṇa viśvāndevāṃstathā nṛpa // GarP_2,27.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3875: sānnāśca sodakā deyā ghaṭāḥ pretahitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3876: śayyādānamatho dattvā ghaṭaṃ pretasya nirvapet // GarP_2,27.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3883: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja kathayāmi nibodha te /
GP12garup2_u:3884: pretatvaṃ na bhavedyena dānena sudṛḍhena ca // GarP_2,27.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3887: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ tu ghaṭaṃ vidhāya brahmośakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3888: kṣīrājyapūrṇavivaraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ // GarP_2,27.57 //
GP12garup2_u:3889: brahmā madhye tathā viṣṇuḥ śaṅkaraḥ śaṅkaro 'vyayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3890: prācyādiṣu ca tatkaṇṭhe lokapālānkrameṇa tu // GarP_2,27.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3892: tato dugdhājyasahitaṃ ghaṭaṃ deyaṃ hiraṇmayam // GarP_2,27.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3898: tato bale samāyāte dattvā rājñe mahāmaṇim /
GP12garup2_u:3901: svapuraṃ sa samāsādya sarvaṃ tatpretabhāṣitam // GarP_2,27.63 //
GP12garup2_u:3903: tasya puṇyapradānena preto mukto divaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3905: kiṃ punaḥ putradattena pitā yātīti cātbhutam // GarP_2,27.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3908: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde babhruvāhanapretasaṃvāde pretatvahetutannivṛttyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3913: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena sukṛtena vā // GarP_2,28.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3916: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ ghaṭakaṃ vidhāya brahmeśakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3917: kṣīrājyapūrṇaviviraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ // GarP_2,28.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3921: saṃsāre sādhu me nātha brūhi kṛtyaṃ janārdana /
GP12garup2_u:3922: yathā kāryā naraiḥ samyak kriyā caivaurdhvadaihikī // GarP_2,28.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3924: kambhavanti suraśreṣṭha karmabhiḥ kaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ // GarP_2,28.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3926: tanme kathaya deveśa ahamicchāmi veditum // GarP_2,28.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3928: adhastācca tilā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_2,28.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3930: kimarthaṃ smaryate viṣṇuḥ viṣṇusūktañca paṭhyate // GarP_2,28.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3935: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3936: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāvo dīyate kena he tunā // GarP_2,28.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3937: kathaṃ ca mriyate janturmṛtasya ca kuto gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3938: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ viśramate tadā // GarP_2,28.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3939: śaṃva skandhe vahetputro vahnidātā ca pautrakaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3940: kimarthaṃ deva deveśa ājyenābhyañjanaṃ kutaḥ // GarP_2,28.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3944: vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram // GarP_2,28.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3946: navakāni ca piṇḍāni kimarthaṃ vitaretsutaḥ // GarP_2,28.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3947: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ pātre pakve ca mṛnmaye /
GP12garup2_u:3948: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇe baddhvā kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,28.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3950: dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca saṃvādaḥ svajanaiḥ saha // GarP_2,28.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3953: idaṃ ca kriyate deva kasmātpiṇḍaṃ pradāpayet // GarP_2,28.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3956: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije /
GP12garup2_u:3957: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha // GarP_2,28.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3959: taiḥ samudvartanaṃ cāpi dadyuḥ sthalajalāśraye // GarP_2,28.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3961: piṇḍaṃ caikādaśe kasmād vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,28.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3965: prāpte kāle ca mriyate anityo mānavaḥ prabho // GarP_2,28.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3966: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3967: kuto gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivyāpo manastathā // GarP_2,28.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3968: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3969: vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cāptaye // GarP_2,28.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3971: tṛṣṇā kāmo 'pyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdana // GarP_2,28.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3973: naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca // GarP_2,28.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3974: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3975: pretasya melanaṃ sārdhaṃ kaiḥ samaṃ tatra ko vidhiḥ // GarP_2,28.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3976: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narābhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:3977: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim // GarP_2,28.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3978: pāpino ye durācārā mudgalatvaṃ ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3979: ātmaghātī brahmahā ca steyī viśvāsaghātakaḥ // GarP_2,28.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3981: dhārayedvā brahmasūtraṃ kā gatistasya mādhava // GarP_2,28.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3982: viprasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhī tā yadā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3984: sarvametanmayā pṛṣṭo vada lokahitāya vai // GarP_2,28.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3985: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadahikakarmakālakriyamāṇanānādānādiphalapraśranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3989: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3994: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga sarvaṃ te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,29.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3995: aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3996: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya ca // GarP_2,29.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3998: dāhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo deyaḥ pautreṇa pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,29.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3999: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4000: pañcaratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,29.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4002: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati pātakam // GarP_2,29.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4004: darbhāṃstatra hi ye bhūmyāṃ tilayuktāna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4005: sarvatra vasudhā pūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:4006: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,29.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4008: alipte āturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4010: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāṃ kurvantyetacca niṣphalam // GarP_2,29.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4011: āturo mucyate naiva maṇḍalena vinā bhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:4012: brahmā rudraśca viṣṇuśca śrīrhutāśana eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:4014: anyathā mriyate yastu bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4015: yonyantaraṃ sa vai gacchetkrīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,29.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4016: miśritaṃ lohatāmraṃ tu tathaiva janma jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4017: tasmaivaṃ vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodaka kriyā // GarP_2,29.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4021: te me dahantu pāṣāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni ca // GarP_2,29.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4023: tarpaṇe dānahome ca datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,29.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4030: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe sthitāḥ // GarP_2,29.20 //
GP12garup2_u:4031: viprā mantrāḥ kuśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara /
GP12garup2_u:4032: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,29.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4036: pañca pravahaṇānyeva bhavābdhau majjatāṃ satām // GarP_2,29.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4044: viṣṇulokaṃ sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ // GarP_2,29.27 //
GP12garup2_u:4048: tatra dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,29.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4050: yasmādannarasāḥ sarve notkaṭā lavaṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,29.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4051: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4054: brāhmaṇa kṣattriyaviśāṃ strīṇāṃ śūdrajanasya ca // GarP_2,29.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4056: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dbārasyoddhāṭanaṃ divaḥ // GarP_2,29.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4057_0: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde
GP12garup2_u:4061: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ guhyaṃ dānānāṃ dānamuttamam /
GP12garup2_u:4062: paramaṃ sarvadānānāṃ paraṃ gopyaṃ divaukasām // GarP_2,30.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4064: yena dattena prīyante bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti kramāt // GarP_2,30.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4069: yamalokaṃ vinirjitya svargaṃ tākṣya sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4070: gāṃ tilāṃśca kṣitaṃ hema yo dadāti dvijanmane /
GP12garup2_u:4073: taddvayaṃ dīyate vipre nānyavarṇe kadācana // GarP_2,30.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4075: anyeṣu naiva varṇeṣu poṣyavarge kadācana // GarP_2,30.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4077: āture voparāge ca dvayaṃ dānaṃ viśiṣyate /
GP12garup2_u:4078: āture dīyate dānaṃ tatkāle copatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,30.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4080: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ yaddattaṃ vikalendriye // GarP_2,30.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4082: ato dadyāt sa putro vā yāvajjīvatsasau ciram /
GP12garup2_u:4083: ativāhastathā preto bhogāṃśca labhate yataḥ // GarP_2,30.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4085: dehe tathātivāhasya parataḥ prīṇanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,30.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4088: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4089: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,30.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4091: lavaṇe dīyamāne tu na bhayaṃ vidyate yamāt // GarP_2,30.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4092: karpāsasya tu dānena na bhūtebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4095: hemabhūmipradānācca na pīḍā narake bhavet // GarP_2,30.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4097: sarve te varadā yānti saptadhānyena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4102: tasmin kāle suto yastu sarvadānāni dāpayet /
GP12garup2_u:4105: putrairyatnena kartavyā pitaraṃ tārayanti te // GarP_2,30.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4107: aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,30.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4108: dharmātmā sa nu putro vaidevairapi supūjyate /
GP12garup2_u:4109: dāpayedyastu dānāni hyāturaṃ pitaraṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,30.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4111: yamaṃ bhīmañca nāpnoti na gacchet tasya veśmani // GarP_2,30.24 //
GP12garup2_u:4112: kuṭhāro musalo daṇḍaḥ khaḍgaśca cchurikā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4116: garbhasthāḥ śiśavo ye ca yuvānaḥ sthavirāstathā /
GP12garup2_u:4119: śabalā śyāmadūtā ye lohadānena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4121: dadate nāture dānaṃ brahmaghnaistu samā hi te // GarP_2,30.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4122: pañcatve bhūmiyuktasya śṛṇu tasya ca yā gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4123: ativāhaḥ punaḥ pretovarṣordhvaṃ sukṛtaṃ labhet // GarP_2,30.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4125: kālatrayaṃ trisandhyaṃ ca trayo varṇāstriśaktayaḥ // GarP_2,30.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4127: grīvāṃ yāvaddharirnābheḥ śarīre manujasya ca // GarP_2,30.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4131: dharmādharme matiṃ dadyāt sukhaduḥkhe kṛtākṛte // GarP_2,30.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4134: svargaṃ ca narakaṃ mokṣaṃ prayānti prāṇino dhruvam // GarP_2,30.35 //
GP12garup2_u:4135: svargasthaṃ narakasthaṃ vā śrāddhe vāpyāyanaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4137: matsyaṃ karmaṃ ca vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhañca vāmanam /
GP12garup2_u:4138: rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca buddhaṃ caiva sakalkinam /
GP12garup2_u:4139: etāni daśa nāmāni smartavyāni sadā budhaiḥ // GarP_2,30.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4140: svargaṃ jīvāḥ sukhaṃ yānti cyutāḥ svargācca mānavāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4141: labdhvā sukhaṃ ca vittaṃ ca dayādākṣiṇyasaṃyutāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4144: aṣṭākṣaraṃ tathā mantraṃ japedvā dvādaśākṣaram // GarP_2,30.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4148: yatra viṣṇuṃ na paśyāmi tena vāsena kiṃ mama // GarP_2,30.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4150: jvālāmālākule viṣṇuḥ sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jagat // GarP_2,30.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4151: vayamāpo vayaṃ pṛthvī vayaṃ darbhā vayaṃ tilāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4152: vayaṃ gāvo vayaṃ rājā vayaṃ vāyurvayaṃ prajāḥ // GarP_2,30.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4153: vayaṃ hema vayaṃ dhānyaṃ vayaṃ madhu vayaṃ ghṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:4154: vayaṃ viprā vayaṃ devā vayaṃ śambhuśca bhūrbhuvaḥ // GarP_2,30.44 //
GP12garup2_u:4155: ahaṃ dātā ahaṃ grāhī ahaṃ yajvā ahaṃ kratuḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4156: ahaṃ hartā ahaṃ dharmo ahaṃ pṛthvī hyahaṃ jalam // GarP_2,30.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4158: yat karma kriyate kvāpi pūrvajanmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,30.46 //
GP12garup2_u:4160: yātanāṃ kurute so 'pi dharme muktiṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_2,30.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4161: manujānāṃ hitā tārkṣya ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā /
GP12garup2_u:4162: tayāvamatya pāpaughaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.48 //
GP12garup2_u:4163: bālatve yacca kaumāre yacca pariṇatau ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:4166: sandhyayoryat kṛtaṃ karma karmaṇā manasā girā // GarP_2,30.50 //
GP12garup2_u:4170: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // GarP_2,30.52 //
GP12garup2_u:4171: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deve vyavasthitā /
GP12garup2_u:4172: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // GarP_2,30.53 //
GP12garup2_u:4173: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde nānādānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃso 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4180: aśvārūḍhāśca te yānti dadate ye hyupānahau // GarP_2,31.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4181: ātape śramayogena na dahyante ca kutracit /
GP12garup2_u:4182: chattradānena vai pretā vicaranti sukhaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4183: yamuddiśya dadātyannaṃ tena cāpyāyito bhavet // GarP_2,31.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4185: uddyotenaiva te yānti dīpadānena mānavāḥ // GarP_2,31.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4187: caturdaśyāñca dīyeta dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai // GarP_2,31.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4189: yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ vāpi pretasya sukhalipsayā // GarP_2,31.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4190: kule dyotati śuddhātmā prakāśatvaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:4193: kuryādyāmyamukhaṃ pitre adbhiḥ saṅkalpya susthiram // GarP_2,31.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4198: sukhe na bhuñjamānastu dena gacchatyalaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4203: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā preto 'sau prīṇito bhavet // GarP_2,31.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4205: mudrikāṃ vastrayugmañca tayā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,31.15 //
GP12garup2_u:4206: yo 'śvaṃ nāvaṃ gajaṃ vāpi brāhmaṇe pratipādayet /
GP12garup2_u:4209: yamaputtrasya yā mātā mahiṣī sugatipradā // GarP_2,31.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4211: tena samprīṇitāḥ sarve tasmin kleśaṃ na kurvate // GarP_2,31.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4216: na bhīṣayanti taṃ yāmyā vastradāne kṛte sati // GarP_2,31.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4221: tathā pretatvamukto 'sau modate saha daivataiḥ // GarP_2,31.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4224: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:4225: mṛtiḥ kuryāt svadharmeṇa yāsyataśca parantapa // GarP_2,31.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4231: vātāhataḥ patatyeva nirādhāro yathā drumaḥ // GarP_2,31.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4232: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
GP12garup2_u:4234: ākāśe ca tathā kāśaḥ sarvavyāpī ca śaṅkare // GarP_2,31.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4235: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup2_u:4236: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ // GarP_2,31.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4242: praviśet sa navaṃ dehaṃ gṛhe dagdhe yathā gṛhī // GarP_2,31.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4244: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyo mātā pitrośca dhātavaḥ // GarP_2,31.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4246: mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogā ye cānye vyādhayastathā // GarP_2,31.35 //
GP12garup2_u:4247: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyate /
GP12garup2_u:4248: eṣa te kathitastārkṣya vināśaḥ sarvadehinām // GarP_2,31.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4256: tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ sarvā bhuvanāni caturdaśa // GarP_2,31.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4257: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4262: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dānapha lānyadehapraveśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai katriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4267: tvacā raktaṃ tathā māṃsaṃ medo majjāsthi jīvitam // GarP_2,32.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4268: pādau pāṇī tathā guhyaṃ jihvā-keśa-nakhāḥ śiraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4270: kāmaḥ krodho bhayaṃ lajjā mano harṣaḥ sukhāsukham /
GP12garup2_u:4273: kartā ko 'tra hṛṣīkeśa saṃsāre duḥ khasaṃkule // GarP_2,32.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4277: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā loke sadayaṃ jīvakāraṇam /
GP12garup2_u:4282: tāvannālokyate vaktraṃ pāpaṃ yāvadvapuḥ sthitam // GarP_2,32.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4284: tṛtīye rajakī jñeyā caturthe 'hani śudhyati // GarP_2,32.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4292: yā caturdaśamī rātrirgarbhastiṣṭhati tatra cet // GarP_2,32.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4294: sā niśā tatra sāmānyairna labhyeta khagādhipa // GarP_2,32.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4300: tasyāścaivātapo varjya śītalaṃ kevalaṃ caret // GarP_2,32.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4302: dharmamādāya manasi sutalpaṃ saṃviśet pumān // GarP_2,32.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4307: caitanyaṃ bījarūpaṃ hi śukre nityaṃ vyavasthitam /
GP12garup2_u:4310: raktādhikye bhavennārī śukrādhikye bhavet pumān // GarP_2,32.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4314: ghanaṃ māṃsañca viṃśāhe garbhastho vardhate kramāt // GarP_2,32.24 //
GP12garup2_u:4316: tathā māse tu sampūrṇe pañcatattvaṃ nidhārayet // GarP_2,32.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4317: māsadvaye tu sañjāte tvacā medaśca jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4319: karṇau ca nāsike vakṣo jāyeran māsi pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:4322: aṣṭame calate jīvo dhātrīgarbhe punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4323: navamemāsi samprāpte garbhasthaujau dṛḍhaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,32.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4325: nārī vātha naro vātha napuṃstvaṃ vābhijāyate // GarP_2,32.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4329: majjāsthiśukramāṃsāni roma raktaṃ balaṃ tathā // GarP_2,32.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4331: navame daśame māsi jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ // GarP_2,32.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4336: mūlabhūtā ime proktāḥ sapta nāḍyantare sthitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4338: ete pañca guṇāḥ proktā mayā bhūmeḥ khageśvara /
GP12garup2_u:4339: yathā pañca guṇāścāpastathā tacchṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,32.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4340: lālā mūtraṃ tathā śukraṃ majjāra raktañca pañcamam /
GP12garup2_u:4341: āpaḥ pañcaguṇāḥ proktā jñātavyāste prayatnataḥ // GarP_2,32.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4342: kṣudhā tṛṣā tathā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntireva ca /
GP12garup2_u:4343: tejaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ proktaṃ tārkṣya sarvatrayogibhiḥ // GarP_2,32.38 //
GP12garup2_u:4344: rāgadveṣau tathā lajjā bhayaṃ mohastathaiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:4345: ityetat kathitaṃ tārkṣya vāyujaṃ guṇapañcakam // GarP_2,32.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4347: nirodhaḥ pañcamaḥ prokto vāyoḥ pañca guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,32.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4349: ākāśasya guṇāḥ pañca jñāta vyāstārkṣya yatnataḥ // GarP_2,32.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4350: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsā buddhīndriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup2_u:4351: pāṇī pādau gudaṃ prāk ca guhyaṃ karmendriyāṇi ca // GarP_2,32.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4352: iḍāca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /
GP12garup2_u:4353: gāndhārī gajajihvā ca pūṣā caiva yasā tathā // GarP_2,32.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4355: piṇḍa madhye sthitā hyetāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍayaḥ // GarP_2,32.44 //
GP12garup2_u:4356: prāṇāpānau samānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:4357: nāgaḥ kūrmaśca kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // GarP_2,32.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4358: ityete vāyavaḥ proktā daśa deheṣu susthitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4361: āhāro bhuktamātrastu vāyunā kriyate dvidhā // GarP_2,32.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4362: sa praviśya guhe samyak pṛthagannaṃ pṛthagjalam /
GP12garup2_u:4372: sapta lakṣāṇi keśāḥ syurnakhāḥ proktāstu viṃśatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4375: palāni daśa medaśca tvacā caiva tu tatsamā // GarP_2,32.54 //
GP12garup2_u:4377: śukraṃ dvikuḍavaṃ jñeyaṃ śoṇitaṃ kuḍavaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,32.55 //
GP12garup2_u:4379: asthnāṃ hi hyadhikaṃ proktaṃ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatrayāt // GarP_2,32.56 //
GP12garup2_u:4381: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaiva hi prāpyate // GarP_2,32.57 //
GP12garup2_u:4383: tale tu karayornyasya vardhate jānupārśvayoḥ // GarP_2,32.58 //
GP12garup2_u:4385: jānupṛṣṭhe tathā netre jānumadhye ca nāsikā // GarP_2,32.59 //
GP12garup2_u:4388: nāḍī vāpyāyanī nāma nābhyāṃ tatra nibadhyate /
GP12garup2_u:4389: strīṇāṃ tathāntrasuṣire sa nibaddhaḥ prajāyate // GarP_2,32.61 //
GP12garup2_u:4395: tathātathā yatiṣyāmi garbhaṃ nāpnomyahaṃ yathā // GarP_2,32.64 //
GP12garup2_u:4399: navame daśame vāpi māsi saṃjāyate tataḥ // GarP_2,32.66 //
GP12garup2_u:4411: svargaṃ ca nirayaṃ caiva svakarmaphalamaśnute // GarP_2,32.72 //
GP12garup2_u:4413: svarloke narake caiva bhuktaprāye dvijottamāḥ // GarP_2,32.73 //
GP12garup2_u:4415: dṛśyate nātra modante pātyamānāstu nārakaiḥ // GarP_2,32.74 //
GP12garup2_u:4421: jātasya bālabhāve 'pi vṛddhatve duḥkhameva ca // GarP_2,32.77 //
GP12garup2_u:4423: duḥsvapnaṃ yā vṛddhatā ca maraṇe duḥ khamutkaṭam // GarP_2,32.78 //
GP12garup2_u:4424: kṛṣyamāṇaśca yāmyaiḥ sa narake 'pi ca yātyadhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4425: punaśca garbhājjanma syānmaraṇaṃ duṣkaraṃ tathā // GarP_2,32.79 //
GP12garup2_u:4429: vinatāsuta mokṣāya yatitavyaṃ tato naraiḥ // GarP_2,32.81 //
GP12garup2_u:4431: kathayāmi kramapraśraṃ pṛṣṭaṃ vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,32.82 //
GP12garup2_u:4434: praśrasyāpi tṛtīyasya uttaraṃ ca vidhīyatām // GarP_2,32.83 //
GP12garup2_u:4437: śṛṇu tatrottaraṃ tūktaṃ kathayāmi samāsataḥ // GarP_2,32.84 //
GP12garup2_u:4440: vāsasī paridhāryātha dhaute tu śuci nī śubhe /
GP12garup2_u:4442: tilān gomayaliptāyāṃ bhūmau tatra niveśayet // GarP_2,32.87 //
GP12garup2_u:4443: prāgudakśirasaṃ vāpi mukhe svarṇaṃ viniḥ kṣepet /
GP12garup2_u:4444: śālagrāmaśilā tatra tulasī ca khageśvara // GarP_2,32.88 //
GP12garup2_u:4447: ādau tu praṇavaṃ kṛtvā pūjādāne tataḥ smṛte /
GP12garup2_u:4450: dattvā dānaṃ ca viprebhyo dīnānāthebhya eva ca // GarP_2,32.91 //
GP12garup2_u:4452: nivartayenmamatvaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ pādau hṛdi smaran // GarP_2,32.92 //
GP12garup2_u:4454: puttrādyāḥ prapaṭheyuste mriyamāṇe nije jane // GarP_2,32.93 //
GP12garup2_u:4460: tilairdarbhaiśca niḥ kṣiptaiḥ snānaṃ kratumayaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,32.96 //
GP12garup2_u:4464: vrajate yadi pāpasyālpatvaṃ puṃso bhavetkhaga // GarP_2,32.98 //
GP12garup2_u:4465: pañcaratne mukhe mukte jive jñānaṃ prarohati /
GP12garup2_u:4466: tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga // GarP_2,32.99 //
GP12garup2_u:4476: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā prīto 'sau sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,32.104 //
GP12garup2_u:4478: brahmāṇḍe ye guṇāḥ santi śarīre te vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_2,32.105 //
GP12garup2_u:4481: pādādhastu talaṃ jñeyaṃ pādordhvaṃ vitalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4482: jānubhyāṃ sutalaṃ viddhi sakthideśe mahātalam // GarP_2,32.107 //
GP12garup2_u:4486: svargalokaṃ hṛdaye vidyāt kaṇṭhadeśe mahastathā // GarP_2,32.109 //
GP12garup2_u:4489: trikoṇe saṃsthito meruradhaḥ koṇe ca mandaraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4490: dakṣiṇe ceva kailāso vāmabhāge himācalaḥ // GarP_2,32.111 //
GP12garup2_u:4494: asthisthāne sthito jambūḥ śāko majjāsu saṃsthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4495: kuśadvīpaḥ sthito māṃse krauñcadvīpaḥ śirāsthitaḥ // GarP_2,32.113 //
GP12garup2_u:4496: tvacāyāṃ śālmalidvāpo plakṣaḥ romṇāṃ ca sañcaye /
GP12garup2_u:4502: nādacakre sthitaḥ sūryo binducakre ca candramāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4503: locanasthaḥ kujo jñeyo hṛdaye ca budhaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,32.117 //
GP12garup2_u:4505: nābhisthāne sthito mando mukhe rāhuḥ sthitaḥ sadā // GarP_2,32.118 //
GP12garup2_u:4506: pāyu (da) sthāne sthitaḥ ketuḥ śarīre grahamaṇḍalam /
GP12garup2_u:4508: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4509: bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā raudrā dāhodbhūtā ca mūrchanā // GarP_2,32.120 //
GP12garup2_u:4511: vināśaḥ pūrṇakāle ca jāyate sarvadehinām // GarP_2,32.121 //
GP12garup2_u:4516: yamaloke vasantyete kuṭyāṃ janma na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:4517: evaṃ sañjāyate tārkṣya martye jantuḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,32.124 //
GP12garup2_u:4518: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4519: āyuḥ karma ca vittañca vidyā nidhanameva ca // GarP_2,32.125 //
GP12garup2_u:4521: karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇaiva pralīyate // GarP_2,32.126 //
GP12garup2_u:4522: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaivābhipadyate /
GP12garup2_u:4527: yathāyathā duṣkṛtaṃ tat kule hīne prajāyate // GarP_2,32.129 //
GP12garup2_u:4529: ataḥ paraṃ kimarthaṃ te kathayāmi khageśvara // GarP_2,32.130 //
GP12garup2_u:4530: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde jantūtpattitadgadhātvādivibhāgabhuvanādivibhāgavarṇanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4536: vistaraṃ tasya me brūhi adhvā caiva kiyān smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,33.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4537: kaiśca pāpaiḥ kṛtairdeva kena vā śubhakarmaṇā /
GP12garup2_u:4543: tatra gacchanti pāpiṣṭhā mānavā mūḍhacetasaḥ // GarP_2,33.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4546: vṛkṣacchāyā na tatrāsti yatra viśramate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4548: tasmin mārge na cānnādyaṃ yena prāṇān prapoṣayet /
GP12garup2_u:4549: na jalaṃ dṛśyate tatra tṛṣā yena vilīyate // GarP_2,33.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4550: kṣudhayā pīḍito yāti tṛṣṇayā ca mahāpathe /
GP12garup2_u:4552: yadyasya yādṛśaṃ pāpaṃ sa panthāstasya tādṛśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4553: sudīnāḥ kṛpaṇā mūḍhā duḥ khairvyāptāstaranti tam // GarP_2,33.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4554: rudanti dāruṇaṃ kecit keciddrohaṃ vadanti ca /
GP12garup2_u:4556: īdṛgvidhaḥ sa vai panthā vijñeyo dāruṇaḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4557: vitṛṣṇā ye narā loke sukhaṃ tasmin vrajanti te // GarP_2,33.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4558: yāniyāni ca dānāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4561: bhramanti vāyubhūtāste ye kṣudrāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ // GarP_2,33.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4562: īdṛśaṃ vartma tadraudraṃ kathitaṃ tava suvrata /
GP12garup2_u:4563: punaśca kathayiṣyāmi yamamārgasya yā sthitiḥ // GarP_2,33.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4565: sarvaṃ vajramayaṃ divyamabhedyaṃ tat surāsuraiḥ // GarP_2,33.15 //
GP12garup2_u:4567: svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vai yasyāṃ yamo dūtaiḥ samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,33.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4576: tatrastho bhagavān dharma āsane tu same śubhe /
GP12garup2_u:4590: na muhyati kadācit sa sukṛte duṣkṛte 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4591: yadyenopārjitaṃ yāvat tāvadvai vetti tasya tat // GarP_2,33.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4597: aiśanyāṃ vai śiro 'rtiśca āgneyyāñcaiva mṛkatā // GarP_2,33.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4599: ebhiḥ parivṛto nityaṃ citraguptaḥ sa tiṣṭhati // GarP_2,33.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4600: yat karma kurute kaścittat sarvaṃ vilakhatyasau /
GP12garup2_u:4612: pīḍyante yamadūtaiśca pāpiṣṭhāḥ subhṛśaṃ narāḥ // GarP_2,33.38 //
GP12garup2_u:4614: yamaloke mayā dṛṣṭā mamasvaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tvayā // GarP_2,33.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4617: dānopakāraṃ vakṣyāmi yathā tatra sukhaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,33.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4618: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistṛtidṛvarṇanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4623: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ nṝṇāmagre dhāvati dhāvatām // GarP_2,34.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4625: dvāpare yajñadāne ca dānamekaṃ kalau yuge // GarP_2,34.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4627: iṣṭāpūrte svaśaktyā hi kurvatāṃ nāsti pātakam // GarP_2,34.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4629: yamamārge sukhaṃ tasya vrajato nitarāṃ bhavet // GarP_2,34.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4631: tapyamānāḥ sukhaṃ yānti sarva kāmaiḥ prapūritāḥ // GarP_2,34.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4633: tena sarvamidaṃ dattaṃ yena dattā vasundharā // GarP_2,34.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4634: yāniyāni ca bhūtāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4637: dadāti vidhinā putra prete tadu patiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4639: tārayet pitaraṃ ghorāt tena puttraḥ pravakṣyate // GarP_2,34.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4641: ativāhastadā preto bhogān vai labhate hi saḥ // GarP_2,34.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4643: dīyate pretarūpo 'sau prīto yāti yamālaye // GarP_2,34.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4644: apakve mṛnmaye pātre dugdhaṃ dattaṃ dinatrayam /
GP12garup2_u:4645: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇairbaddhvā prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,34.12 //
GP12garup2_u:4646: prathame 'hni dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca tathā khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4651: na pūrvāhne na madhyāhne nāparāhne na sandhiṣu /
GP12garup2_u:4653: puttreṇa datte te sarve gotriṇo hitabāndhavāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4654: svajātyaiḥ parajātyaiśca deyo nadyāṃ jalāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,34.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4655: gantavyaṃ naiva vipreṇa dātuṃ śīghraṃ jalāñjalim /
GP12garup2_u:4656: nivṛttāśca yadā nāryo lokācāraḥ sadābhavet // GarP_2,34.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4657: pañcatvañca gate śūdre yaḥ kāṣṭhaṃ nayate citām /
GP12garup2_u:4659: trirātre ca tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gacchet samudragām /
GP12garup2_u:4660: prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kṛtvā ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati // GarP_2,34.19 //
GP12garup2_u:4661: śūdro gacchati sarvatra vaiśyastriṣu dvayoḥ paraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4662: gacchati svīyavarṇeṣu dātuṃ prete jalāñjalim // GarP_2,34.20 //
GP12garup2_u:4664: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,34.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4666: yatra sthāne mṛto yastu adhvanyapi gṛhe 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4667: viśleṣastu tataḥ sthānānna kvacidvihito budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4672: gotribhirna ca kartavyaṃ gṛhānnañca na bhojayet /
GP12garup2_u:4673: bhuñjīta mṛnmaye pātre uttānañca vivarjayet // GarP_2,34.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4677: vāyurūpo bhramatyeva vāyurūrdhvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.27 //
GP12garup2_u:4679: navakaiḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaiḥ prayāti hi kuṭīṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,34.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4680: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumayī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4681: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,34.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4682: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi tadā garbhaṃ na dhārayet /
GP12garup2_u:4683: ādarācca tato bhūmau tiladarbhānviniḥ kṣipet // GarP_2,34.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4684: paśutve sthāvaratve ca yatra kvāpi sa jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4687: yathā śrāddhaṃ yamuddiśya kṛtaṃ tasyopatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4690: piṇḍadānaṃ na yasyābhūdākāśe bhramate tu saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4692: ākāśe vasate trīṇi dinamekantu vāsake // GarP_2,34.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4693: dagdhe dehe ca vahnau ca jalenaiva tu tarpitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4695: prathame 'hni tṛtīye ca pañcame saptame 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4697: gṛhadvāre śmaśāne vā tīrthe devālaye 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4698: yatrādyo dīyate piṇḍastatra sarvān samāpayet // GarP_2,34.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4702: dadyādviprāya yaḥ śayyāṃ yathoktaṃ pretamokṣadām // GarP_2,34.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4703: na bhavet yadā sa gotro paro 'pi vidhimācaret /
GP12garup2_u:4704: bhāryā vā puruṣaḥ kaścit tuṣṭaśca kurute striyaḥ // GarP_2,34.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4706: annādyena ca tenaiva sarvaśrāddhāni kārayet // GarP_2,34.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4708: śrāddhaṃ kṛtantu yairvastraistāni tyaktvā gṛhaṃ viśet // GarP_2,34.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4709: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yadi vā pumān /
GP12garup2_u:4710: prathame 'hani yaḥ kuryāt sa daśāhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,34.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4714: caturṇāmapi varṇānāmeṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4716: caturastu dvitīye 'hni tṛtīye trīṃśtathaiva ca // GarP_2,34.46 //
GP12garup2_u:4718: ekoddiṣṭantu vai śrāddhaṃ caturthe 'hani kārayet // GarP_2,34.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4720: cakṣuḥ śrotrañca nāsā ca dvitīye 'hni prajāyate // GarP_2,34.48 //
GP12garup2_u:4721: gaṇḍau vaktraṃ tathā grīvā tṛtīye 'hani jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4722: hṛdayaṃ kukṣirudaraṃ caturthe tadvadeva hi // GarP_2,34.49 //
GP12garup2_u:4724: ṣaṣṭhe ūrū ca vijñeye saptame gulphasambhavaḥ // GarP_2,34.50 //
GP12garup2_u:4725: aṣṭame divase prāpte jaṅghe ca bhavato 'ṇḍaja /
GP12garup2_u:4726: pādau ca navame jñeyau daśame balavatkṣudhā // GarP_2,34.51 //
GP12garup2_u:4728: siddhānnaṃ tasya dātavyaṃ kṛśarāḥ pūpakāḥ payaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4731: tripakṣañcāpi ṣaṇmāse dve śrāddhāni ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,34.53 //
GP12garup2_u:4732: prati māsaṃ pradātavyaṃ mṛtāhe yā tithirbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4733: sa māsaḥ prathamo jñeya iti vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,34.54 //
GP12garup2_u:4735: tadeva prathamaṃ śrāddhaṃ tat syādekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,34.55 //
GP12garup2_u:4736: sā tithirmāsike śrāddhe mṛto yasmin dine naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4737: riktayośca tripakṣe ca sā tithirnādriyeta vai // GarP_2,34.56 //
GP12garup2_u:4738: paurṇamāsyāṃ mṛto yo 'sau caturthī tasya conakā /
GP12garup2_u:4739: caturthyāntu mṛto yastu navamī tasya conakā // GarP_2,34.57 //
GP12garup2_u:4740: navamyāñca mṛto yaśca riktā tasya caturdaśī /
GP12garup2_u:4741: etā riktāśca vijñeyā antyeṣṭau kuśalena ca // GarP_2,34.58 //
GP12garup2_u:4743: catuṣpathe tyajedannaṃ punaḥ snānaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,34.59 //
GP12garup2_u:4749: etasmāddīyate kumbhaḥ prītiḥ pretasya jāyate // GarP_2,34.62 //
GP12garup2_u:4750: yasmin dine mṛto janturaṭavyāṃ viṣame 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4751: yadā tadā bhaveddāhaḥ sūtakaṃ mṛtavāsarāt // GarP_2,34.63 //
GP12garup2_u:4753: ekādaśāhe dātavyaṃ tena śūddho dvijo bhavet // GarP_2,34.64 //
GP12garup2_u:4754: kṣattriyo dvādaśāhe tu vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśe tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4755: śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsena mṛtake jātasūtake // GarP_2,34.65 //
GP12garup2_u:4756: māsatraye trirātraṃ syāt ṣaṇmāsena tu pakṣiṇī /
GP12garup2_u:4758: anenaivā nusāreṇa śuddhiḥ syāt sārvavarṇikī // GarP_2,34.66 //
GP12garup2_u:4762: evaṃ pracchādyate sarvaṃ na preto bhavati kvacit // GarP_2,34.68 //
GP12garup2_u:4764: anityaṃ jīvanaṃ ysamāt paścāt ko nu pradāsyati // GarP_2,34.69 //
GP12garup2_u:4766: mṛte mṛta iti jñātvā kṣaṇāt sneho nivartate // GarP_2,34.70 //
GP12garup2_u:4770: evaṃ jānannidaṃ sarvaṃ svahastenaiva dāpayet // GarP_2,34.72 //
GP12garup2_u:4773: tasyāṃ saṃsthāpya haimañca hariṃ lakṣmyā samanvitam // GarP_2,34.73 //
GP12garup2_u:4775: vijñeyo garuḍa prītyai sa nidrākalaśo budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.74 //
GP12garup2_u:4783: vastraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ pūjya cailakaṃ paridhāpayet // GarP_2,34.78 //
GP12garup2_u:4790: tathā caikādaśāhe tu vidhireṣa prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_2,34.82 //
GP12garup2_u:4791: dadāti yo hi dharmārthe bāndhavo bāndhave mṛte /
GP12garup2_u:4792: viśeṣamatra pakṣe tu kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu // GarP_2,34.83 //
GP12garup2_u:4793: upayuktañca tasyāsīt yat kiñcit svagṛhe purā /
GP12garup2_u:4795: yadabhīṣṭañca tasyāsīt tat sarvaṃ parikalpayet // GarP_2,34.84 //
GP12garup2_u:4796: sthāpayet puruṣaṃ haimaṃ śayyopari śubhaṃ budhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4800: pīḍayanti na taṃ yāmyāḥ puruṣā bhīṣaṇānanāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4801: na gharmeṇa na śītena bādhyate sa naraḥ kvacit // GarP_2,34.87 //
GP12garup2_u:4803: apiḥ pāpasamāyuktaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.88 //
GP12garup2_u:4807: bharturyā kurute nārī tasyāḥ śreyo hyanantakam // GarP_2,34.90 //
GP12garup2_u:4808: upakārāya sā bharturjīvantī na mṛtā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4809: uddharejjīvamānā sā satī satyavatī priyam // GarP_2,34.91 //
GP12garup2_u:4811: vastrabhūṣā tathā śayyā sarvametaddhi dāpayet // GarP_2,34.92 //
GP12garup2_u:4813: bhūṣaṇaṃ gātralagnañca vastu bhogyādikañca yat // GarP_2,34.93 //
GP12garup2_u:4814: tat sarvaṃ melayitvā tu svesve sthāne niyojayet /
GP12garup2_u:4820: ātmā śambhuḥ śivā gaurī śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:4823: gṛhīte brāhmaṇastatra ko 'dāditi ca kīrtayet // GarP_2,34.98 //
GP12garup2_u:4825: vidhinānena vai pakṣin dānamekasya dāpayet // GarP_2,34.99 //
GP12garup2_u:4826: bahubhyo na pradeyāni gaurgṛhaṃ śayanaṃ striyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4827: vibhaktadakṣiṇā hyete dātāraṃ pātayanti hi // GarP_2,34.100 //
GP12garup2_u:4828: evaṃ yo vitaret tārkṣya śṛṇu tasya ca yat phalam /
GP12garup2_u:4829: sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ divyaṃ svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,34.101 //
GP12garup2_u:4831: dvārakāyāntu yat puṇyaṃ candrasūryagrahe tathā // GarP_2,34.102 //
GP12garup2_u:4836: yatrāsau jāyate prāṇī bhuṅkte tatraiva tat phalam /
GP12garup2_u:4837: karmakṣaye kṣitau yāti mānuṣaḥ śubhadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,34.105 //
GP12garup2_u:4839: punaḥ sa yāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ mṛto 'sau narapuṅgavaḥ // GarP_2,34.106 //
GP12garup2_u:4841: aho 'sau havyakavyeṣu pitṛbhiḥ saha modate // GarP_2,34.107 //
GP12garup2_u:4843: maghāsu pitṛparvāṇi yāniyāni ca teṣu ca // GarP_2,34.108 //
GP12garup2_u:4844: śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyaṃ pretatve pitaro yadi /
GP12garup2_u:4846: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ pūrṇe varṣe na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4847: ādyantu śavaśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvā caivākṣa ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,34.110 //
GP12garup2_u:4849: vṛddhiṃ prāpyāgrataḥ kuryācchūdrasya svacchayaiva hi // GarP_2,34.111 //
GP12garup2_u:4851: na cāsau kurute yāvat preta eva sa vahnimān /
GP12garup2_u:4852: dvādaśāhe tataḥ kāryaṃ sāgnikena sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.112 //
GP12garup2_u:4854: abdamadhye na kurvīta sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.113 //
GP12garup2_u:4855: sapatnyo yadi bahvyaḥ syurekā putravatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4858: samācārādbhavet pāpī pitṛhā cāpi jāyate // GarP_2,34.115 //
GP12garup2_u:4859: mṛte bhartari yā nārī prāṇāṃścaiva parityajet /
GP12garup2_u:4860: bhartraiva hi samaṃ tasyāḥ prakurvīta sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.116 //
GP12garup2_u:4861: asthānikāpi yā vyūḍhā vaiśyā vā kṣattriyāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4862: yāḥ patnyo vai pituḥ kaścit kuryāt putraḥ sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.117 //
GP12garup2_u:4864: ekoddiṣṭantu tacchrāddha sā tu tenaiva yujyate // GarP_2,34.118 //
GP12garup2_u:4865: anye tu daśa ye putrā jātā varṇa catuṣṭaye /
GP12garup2_u:4866: te tāsutāsu yoktvayāḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇe sadā // GarP_2,34.119 //
GP12garup2_u:4868: pituḥ pṛthak pradāvyaṃ striyāḥ piṇḍaṃ sapiṇḍane // GarP_2,34.120 //
GP12garup2_u:4870: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti tārkṣya mataṃ mama // GarP_2,34.121 //
GP12garup2_u:4871: aputrāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ tu patiḥ kuryāt sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:4873: putro nāsti na bhartā ca strīṇāṃ tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:4876: ekoddiṣṭena dātavyaṃ pareṇa saha bhrātṛbhiḥ // GarP_2,34.124 //
GP12garup2_u:4879: adāhe na ca kartavyaṃ sadāhe kārayedbudhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4881: pituḥ putreṇa kartavyaṃ na kurbvīta pitā sute /
GP12garup2_u:4886: antyeṣṭiṃ kurute hyeko munibhaiḥ samudāhṛtam // GarP_2,34.129 //
GP12garup2_u:4888: ekaikena ca kartavyā putreṇa ca svayaṃsvayam // GarP_2,34.130 //
GP12garup2_u:4891: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GP12garup2_u:4896: pārvaṇaṃ na sutaiḥ kāryaṃ śrāddhaṃ nāndīmukhaṃ na ca // GarP_2,34.134 //
GP12garup2_u:4900: pitṛpiṇḍo na dātavyaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.136 //
GP12garup2_u:4902: apūrṇe 'pyabdamadhyepi kartavyamiti ke ca na // GarP_2,34.137 //
GP12garup2_u:4904: kartavyaṃ tacca vai sarvameṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.138 //
GP12garup2_u:4906: ṛṣīṇāṃ pitaro devāḥ pitā jayati tena vai // GarP_2,34.139 //
GP12garup2_u:4909: mṛte pitaryabdamadhye yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kārayet sutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4910: saptajanmakṛtā dharmāt hīyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,34.141 //
GP12garup2_u:4912: bhramanti vāyunā sarve kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ paripīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,34.142 //
GP12garup2_u:4914: atha māturvipattiḥ syāt pitṛkāryaṃ na lupyate // GarP_2,34.143 //
GP12garup2_u:4915: mṛtā mātā pitā tiṣṭhejjīvantī ca pitāmahī /
GP12garup2_u:4916: sapiṇḍanantu kartavyaṃ pitāmahyā sahaiva tu // GarP_2,34.144 //
GP12garup2_u:4917: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama /
GP12garup2_u:4918: na piṇḍo milito yeṣāṃ mṛtānāntu nṛṇāṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,34.145 //
GP12garup2_u:4921: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadehikādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4926: puruṣasya ca kasyāpi matā pañcatvamāgatā // GarP_2,35.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4927: pitāmahī jīvati ca tathā ca prapitāmahī /
GP12garup2_u:4930: kena sā melyate mātā etat kathaya me prabho // GarP_2,35.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4939: antyastu tyājako jñeyo yo vṛddhaprapitāmahaḥ // GarP_2,35.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4941: lepakastvantimo yastu sa bhavet paṅktisannidhaḥ // GarP_2,35.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4943: ityete pitaro jñeyā ekaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ // GarP_2,35.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4945: jāyate 'tra na sandehaḥ śṛṇu tasyāpi yat phalam // GarP_2,35.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4946: pitā dadāti puttrān vai vicchinnasantatiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4948: kṛte śrāddhe guṇā hyete pitṝṇāṃ tapeṇe smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4950: yasya puṃsaśca martye vai vicchinnā santatiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4951: sa vasennarake ghore paṅke magnaḥ karī yathā // GarP_2,35.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4953: na santatiṃ vinā so 'tra mucyate narakāddhruvam // GarP_2,35.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4954: ācāryastasya śiṣyo vā yo dūre 'pi hi gātrejaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4957: nivasennākaloke ca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_2,35.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4959: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,35.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4961: dīyate na jalaṃ tatra aśubhaṃ jāyate dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:4962: lokayātrā na kartavyā duḥ khārtaḥ svajano yadi // GarP_2,35.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4968: sadyāhutikaraṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthe taddāha uttamaḥ // GarP_2,35.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4970: śavasya ca samīpe tu kṣipyante puttalāstataḥ // GarP_2,35.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4972: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiśca puttalakaiḥ saha // GarP_2,35.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4974: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na gatiṃ labhate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4975: tilān gāśca suvarṇaṃ ca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,35.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4977: sūtakānte ca satputraiḥ sa preto labhate gatim // GarP_2,35.26 //
GP12garup2_u:4981: vidhānaṃ yo na kurvīta vighnastasya prajāyate // GarP_2,35.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4983: āśiṣo dviguṇān darbhān praṇavān naikapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,35.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4985: vikiraṃ ca svadhākāraṃ pitṛśabdaṃ na coccaret // GarP_2,35.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4988: na kuryāt tilahomañca dvijaḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4991: sthāne dvāre cārdhamārge citāyāṃ śavahastake // GarP_2,35.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4993: ṣaṣṭhaṃ sañcayane proktaṃ daśa piṇḍā daśāhikāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4995: anyacca ṣoḍaśaṃ madhye dvitīyaṃ tārkṣya me śṛṇu /
GP12garup2_u:4998: evaṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhuretat tattvavido janāḥ // GarP_2,35.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5000: tripakṣasambhavañcaiva dve rikte khaga ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,35.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5003: śatārdhena vihīno yo militaḥ paṅktibhāṅna hi /
GP12garup2_u:5006: melanīyaḥ śatārdhena sandhiḥ śrāddhena tattvataḥ // GarP_2,35.40 //
GP12garup2_u:5009: evaṃ cenna vidhānaṃ vidhīyate tatpiśācaparibhavanam // GarP_2,35.41 //
GP12garup2_u:5011: śavaṃ na muñceta mucyate cet duḥ sparśāddurgatirbhavet // GarP_2,35.42 //
GP12garup2_u:5012: grāmamadhye sthite prete śrute bhuṅkte yadṛcchayā /
GP12garup2_u:5015: grāmamadhye sthite prete varjayet piṇḍapātanam // GarP_2,35.42 // (35.44)
GP12garup2_u:5017: grāmamadhye sthite prete śuddhyarthaṃ jñātidharmataḥ // GarP_2,35.43 // (35.45)
GP12garup2_u:5020: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sapiṇḍanaśavavidhyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5025: svagṛhantu parityajya tīrthe vai mriyate yadi // GarP_2,36.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5026: aprāpya tīrthaṃ mriyate gṛhe vā mṛtyu māgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5027: būtvā kuṭīcaro yastu sa kāṃ gatimavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,36.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5028: saṃnyāsaṃ kurute yastu tīrthe vāpi gṛhe 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5030: niyame cet kṛte deva cittabhaṅgo hi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5031: kena tasya bhavet siddhiḥ kṛtenāpyakṛtena vā // GarP_2,36.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5033: kṛtvā niraśanaṃ yo vai mṛtyumāpnoti ko 'pi cet /
GP12garup2_u:5034: mānupīṃ tanumutsṛjya mama tulyo virājate // GarP_2,36.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5037: tīrthe gṛhe vā saṃnyāsaṃ nītvā cenmriyate yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5038: pratyahaṃ labhate so 'pi pūrvoktaṃ dviguṇaṃ phalam // GarP_2,36.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5040: punarna jāyate rogo devavaddhi virājate // GarP_2,36.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5041: ya āturaḥ san sannyāsaṃ gṛhṇāti yadi mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5042: punarna jāyate bhūmau saṃsāre duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,36.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5046: mṛto muktimavāpnoti yathā sarve maharṣayaḥ // GarP_2,36.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5048: tasmāt svasthe cottare vā sādhayenmokṣalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,36.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5049: puttradravyādi santyajya tīrthaṃ vrajati yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5053: vrataṃ niraśana kṛtvā svagṛhe 'pi mṛto yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5055: annañcaiva tathā toyaṃ parityajya naro yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5058: yamadūtā viśeṣeṇa na yāmyāstasya pārśvagāḥ // GarP_2,36.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5061: sevite 'pi sadā tathi hyanyatra mriyate yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5062: śubhe deśe kule dhīmān sa bhavedvedaviddvijaḥ // GarP_2,36.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5064: brāhmaṇān sa samāhūya sarvasvaṃ yat parityajet // GarP_2,36.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5066: anṛtaṃ na vadet paścāddharmameva samācaret // GarP_2,36.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5067: tīrthe gatvā ca yaḥ ko 'pi punarāyāti vai gṛham /
GP12garup2_u:5068: anujñātaḥ sa vai vipraiḥ prāyaścittamathācaret // GarP_2,36.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5070: tīrthaṃ yadi labhed yastu mṛtyukāle sa bhāgyavān // GarP_2,36.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5072: padepade tu godānaṃ yadi hiṃsā na jāyate // GarP_2,36.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5073: gṛhe tu yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tīrthasnānena śudhyati /
GP12garup2_u:5074: kurute tatra pāpañcedvajralepasamaṃ hi tat // GarP_2,36.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5076: tatra dattāni dānāni jāyante cākṣayāṇi vai // GarP_2,36.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5079: dānavantaṃ naraṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5080: ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmaṇa citraguptena sarvadā // GarP_2,36.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5082: parādhīnaṃ mṛte sarvaṃ kṛpayā kaḥ pradāsyati // GarP_2,36.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5084: ātmānaṃ sadhanaṃ tena cakre putraprapautrakaiḥ // GarP_2,36.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5088: mṛtāḥ śocanti te sarve kadaryāḥ pāpinastviti // GarP_2,36.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5093: udāse dhārmikaḥ saumyaḥ prāpyāpi vipulaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:5095: na caivopadravāstasya mohajālo na caiva hi /
GP12garup2_u:5096: mṛtyukāle na ca bhayaṃ yamadūtasamudbhavam // GarP_2,36.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5097: samāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta vai jale daśaikamagnau pavane ca ṣoḍaśa /
GP12garup2_u:5098: mahāhave paṣṭiraśītirgogṛhe anāśake kāśyapa cākṣayā gatiḥ // GarP_2,36.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5099: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'naśanamṛta gatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5104: vidhinā kena kartavyā kṛtireṣā janārdana // GarP_2,37.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5105: kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ kena pūrṇāḥ kasya deyā janārdana /
GP12garup2_u:5111: dvādaśāhe ca paṇmāse traipakṣe vāpi vatsare /
GP12garup2_u:5112: udakumbhāḥ pradātavyā mārge tasya sukhāya vai // GarP_2,37.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5116: suprītastena dattena preto yāmyaiḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,37.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5118: vidhinā tatra saṅkalpaya ghaṭān dvādaśasaṃkhyakān // GarP_2,37.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5120: viṣṇumuddiśya dātavyā saṃkalpya brāhmaṇe śubhe // GarP_2,37.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5121: eko vai dharmarājāya tena tuṣṭena muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:5122: citraguptāya caikaṃ tu gatastatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,37.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5127: pakvānnajalapūrṇo hi yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ dinam // GarP_2,37.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5129: ekā vai vardhanī tatra tasyāṃ pātrantu vaṃśajam // GarP_2,37.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5136: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe sodakumbhaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5140: dānatīrthārthitaṃ mokṣaṃ svargañca vada me prabho /
GP12garup2_u:5141: kena mokṣamavāpnoti kena svarge vasecciram // GarP_2,38.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5143: mānuṣyaṃ kena labhate narakeśu nimajjati // GarP_2,38.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5145: brūhi kasmin mṛte svarge punarjanma na vidyate // GarP_2,38.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5147: mānuṣyaṃ bhārate varṣe trayodaśasu jātiṣu // GarP_2,38.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5148: tat prāpya mriyate kṣetre punarjanma na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:5149: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantikā // GarP_2,38.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5151: sannyastamiti yo bruyāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // GarP_2,38.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5152: mṛto viṣṇupuraṃ yāti na punarjāyate kṣitau /
GP12garup2_u:5155: kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,38.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5157: śālagrāmajilā yatra yatra dvāravatī śilā // GarP_2,38.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5158: ubhayoḥ saṅgamo yatra muktistatra na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5162: tulasī dahate pāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ janmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,38.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5164: yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe na sa lipyeta pātakaiḥ // GarP_2,38.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5165: na kāṣṭhe vidyate devo na śilāyāṃ kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:5166: bhāve hi vidyate devastasmādbhāvaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,38.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5168: na te śivapurīṃ yānti cittavṛttirgarīyasī // GarP_2,38.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5169: yādṛk cittapratītiḥ syāt tādṛk karmaphalaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:5171: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe ca strīṇāṃ balavadheṣu ca /
GP12garup2_u:5172: prāṇatyāgaparo yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,38.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5173: anāśake mṛtau yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt /
GP12garup2_u:5174: anāśake mṛto yastu sa muktaḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ // GarP_2,38.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5176: ete vai mokṣamārgāśca svargamārgāstathaiva ca // GarP_2,38.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5179: ātmānaṃ tatra santyajya svargavāsaṃ labhecciram // GarP_2,38.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5183: prabhāse śrīsthale caiva arbude ca tripuṣkare // GarP_2,38.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5184: bhūteśvare mṛto yastu svarge vasati mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5185: brahmaṇo divasaṃ yāvat tataḥ patati bhūtale // GarP_2,38.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5187: sarvaṃ kalaṃ sa muddhṛtya svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,38.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5189: indraloke vaset so 'pi svakulaiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,38.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5193: jīrṇoddhāreṇa vā teṣāṃ tat puṇyaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,38.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5195: kṛtvā viprāya viduṣe pradadāti kuṭumbine // GarP_2,38.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5196: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ca naraḥ svarge mahīyate // GarP_2,38.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5197: yā strī savarṇā saṃśubā mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajet /
GP12garup2_u:5198: sā mṛtā svargamāpnoti varṣāṇāṃ romasaṃkhyatā // GarP_2,38.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5200: svargaṃ labhetāṃ tau cobhau divyastrībhiralaṅkṛtau // GarP_2,38.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5202: prakṣālayati sarvāṇi yā svaṃ patimanuvrajet // GarP_2,38.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5212: saro bhirdaśabhistulyā yā prapā nirjale vane // GarP_2,38.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5213: yā vāpī nirjale deśe yaddānaṃ nirdhane dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5214: prāṇināṃ yo dayāṃ dhatte sa bhavennākanāyakaḥ // GarP_2,38.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5216: sa tat sarvaṃ phalaṃ prāpya pratiṣṭhāṃ paramāṃ labhet // GarP_2,38.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5217: phalgu kāryaṃ parityajya satataṃ dharmavān bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5218: dānaṃ damo dayā ceti sārametat trayaṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,38.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5221: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttamalokagatyāgatimokṣamānuṣyahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5225: sūtakānāṃ vidhiṃ brūhi dayāṃ kṛtvā mayiprabho /
GP12garup2_u:5226: vivekāya hi cittasya mānavānāṃ hitāya ca // GarP_2,39.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5231: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaśca nivartate // GarP_2,39.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5235: snānaṃ sacelaṃ kartavyaṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_2,39.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5236: āmagarbhāśca ye jīvā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5239: rājānaḥ śrotiyāścaiva sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_2,39.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5242: eteṣāṃ sūtakaṃ nāsti yasya cecchanti pārthivāḥ // GarP_2,39.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5243: prasave ca sapiṇḍānāṃ na kuryāt saṅkaraṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5244: daśāhācchrudhyate mātā avagāhya pitā śuciḥ // GarP_2,39.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5250: tāvat syādaśucirvipro yāvat tat syādanirdaśam // GarP_2,39.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5251: udite niyame dāne ārte vipre nivedayet /
GP12garup2_u:5252: tathaiva ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ yathākālaṃ na duṣyati // GarP_2,39.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5254: mṛttikayā tathānte ca naraḥ snātvā śucirbhavet // GarP_2,39.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5255: dānaṃ pariṣade dadyāt suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5256: kṣattriyo dviguṇaṃ caiva vaiśyastu triguṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,39.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5260: ahastu sūtakaṃ tasya tvabdānāṃ saṃkhyayā smṛtam // GarP_2,39.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5261: brāhmaṇārthe vipannā ye nārīṇāṃ gograheṣu ca /
GP12garup2_u:5269: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sūtakakālādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai konacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5274: kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhavenmārgaḥ kiṃ sthānaṃ kā gatirbhavet // GarP_2,40.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5275: kiñca yuktaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ vidhānaṃ vāpi kīdṛśam /
GP12garup2_u:5276: tadahaṃ śrotumicchāmi brūhi me madhusūdana // GarP_2,40.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5280: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ jāte durmaraṇe sati /
GP12garup2_u:5285: yānti te narakeghore ye ca mlecchādibhirhatāḥ // GarP_2,40.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5287: ullaṅghitā mṛtā ye ca mahārogaiśca pīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,40.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5293: na teṣāṃ kārayeddāhaṃ sūtakaṃ nodakakriyām // GarP_2,40.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5294: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyaṃ ca na kuryādaurdhvadaihikam /
GP12garup2_u:5297: ṣaṇmāsaṃ brāhmaṇe dāhastrimāsaṃ kṣattriye mataḥ // GarP_2,40.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5298: sārdha māsaṃ tu vaiśyasya sadyaḥ śūdre vidhīyate /
GP12garup2_u:5299: gaṅgāyāṃ yamunāyāñca naimiṣe puṣkare 'tha ca // GarP_2,40.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5300: taḍāge jalūpūrṇe vā hrade vā vimalodake /
GP12garup2_u:5301: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe gṛhe vā pratimālaye // GarP_2,40.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5303: pretāya tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ mantraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,40.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5311: dānadharmarataḥ śāntaḥ praṇamya vāgyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_2,40.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5313: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhatyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,40.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5316: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca calekam /
GP12garup2_u:5321: śaṅkhapātre tathā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,40.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5328: ye devāsaścaturthe tu samudraṃ gaccha pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:5329: agnirjyoti stathā ṣaṣṭhe hiraṇyagarbhaḥ saptame // GarP_2,40.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5331: taśame yāḥ phalinīti piṇḍe caikādaśe tataḥ // GarP_2,40.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5339: sīsakaṃ tu bhavetpretaṃ tvatha vā darbhakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5340: śannodevīti mantreṇa govindaṃ paścime nyaset // GarP_2,40.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5344: madhye maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā sthāpyo darbhamayo naraḥ // GarP_2,40.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5345: brahmā viṣṇustathā rudro yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5348: japaṃ karyātpṛthaktatra brahmādau devatāsu ca // GarP_2,40.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5351: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5362: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,40.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5364: śatatrayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ prokto 'sthisañcayaḥ // GarP_2,40.45 //
GP12garup2_u:5368: bāhuyugme śataṃ dadyātkaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim // GarP_2,40.47 //
GP12garup2_u:5372: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāne tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
GP12garup2_u:5374: antreṣu nālakaṃ dadyādbālakaṃ prāṇa eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5375: vasāyīṃ medakaṃ dadyādgomūtreṇa tu mūtrakam // GarP_2,40.50 //
GP12garup2_u:5376: gandhakaṃ dhātavo deyo haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup2_u:5377: retaḥ sthāne pāradañca purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā // GarP_2,40.51 //
GP12garup2_u:5378: manaḥ śilāṃ tathā gātre tilakalkañca sandhiṣu /
GP12garup2_u:5379: yavapiṣṭaṃ tathā māṃse madhu vai kṣaudrameva ca // GarP_2,40.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5383: vṛntākaṃ vṛṣaṇadvandve liṅge syādgṛñjanaṃ śubham // GarP_2,40.54 //
GP12garup2_u:5384: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkaupīne ca trapu smṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5387: paridhānaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ hṛdaye rukmakaṃ nyaset // GarP_2,40.56 //
GP12garup2_u:5388: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣuṣośca kapardakau /
GP12garup2_u:5393: śirome śrīriti ṛcā punantu varuṇeti ca /
GP12garup2_u:5396: (tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5397: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pānaṃ samṛtam // GarP_2,40.61 //
GP12garup2_u:5398: tilapātraṃ tato dattvā padadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,40.61*1 //
GP12garup2_u:5402: pretaṃmokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpya ca // GarP_2,40.63 //
GP12garup2_u:5403: oṃ viṣṇuriti saṃsmṛtya pretaṃ tanmṛtyumeva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5406: sarvaṃ varṣavidhiṃ kuryādevaṃ pretaśca muktibhāk // GarP_2,40.65 //
GP12garup2_u:5407: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'pamṛtyau sukhaduḥ khalābhālābhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
