GP12garup2_u:5412: kārtikādiṣu māseṣu paurṇamāsyāṃ śubhe dine // GarP_2,41.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5415: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe sthāpyāgniṃ vidhivattataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5418: puryukṣaṇānte homaṃ ca karyā dvai brāhmaṇena tu // GarP_2,41.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5419: āghārāvājyabhāgau ca cakṣuṣī ca pradā payet /
GP12garup2_u:5422: agnaye rudrāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya śivāya /
GP12garup2_u:5438: evaṃ vidhiḥ samāyuktaḥ pretamokṣe karoti hi // GarP_2,41.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5439: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsarganirūpaṇaṃ nāmai kacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5447: nāsti bhamisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti bhamisamo nidhiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5448: nāsti satyasamo dharmo nānṛtātpātakaṃ param // GarP_2,42.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5449: agnerapatyaṃ prathamaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūrvaiṣṇavī sūryasutāśca gāvaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5450: lokatrayaṃ tena bhavetpradattaṃ yaḥ kāñcanaṃ gāṃ ca mahīṃ ca dadyāt // GarP_2,42.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5453: kṛtvā bahūni pāpāni raudrāṇi vipulāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:5456: sa yāti narake ghore yastaṃ na parirakṣati // GarP_2,42.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5460: vṛtticchede tathā vṛtteḥ karaṇaṃ lakṣadhenukam // GarP_2,42.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5461: varamekāpyapahṛtā na tu dattaṃ gavāṃ śatam /
GP12garup2_u:5462: ekāṃ hṛtvā śataṃ dattvā na tena samatā bhavet // GarP_2,42.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5463: svayameva tu yo dattvā svayameva prabādhate /
GP12garup2_u:5464: sa pāpī narakaṃ yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,42.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5466: avṛttikarśite dīne brāhmaṇe gakṣite yathā // GarP_2,42.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5468: yatpuṇyaṃ durbale traste brāhmaṇe parirakṣite // GarP_2,42.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5470: yuddhakāle viśīryante saikatāḥ setavo yathā // GarP_2,42.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5471: svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo harecca vasundharām /
GP12garup2_u:5480: jvalantamagnimutsṛjya na hi bhasmani hūyate // GarP_2,42.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5481: saṃkrāntau yāni dānāni havyakavyāni yāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:5484: pratigrahācchrudhyati jāpyahomaṃ na yājanaṃ karma punanti vedāḥ // GarP_2,42.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5487: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde bhūdānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5492: aindavābhyāṃ viśudhyanti dattvā dhenuṃ tathā vṛṣam // GarP_2,43.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5494: prāyaścittaṃ carenmātā pitā vānyo 'pi bāndhavaḥ // GarP_2,43.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5496: rājadaṇḍo na tasyāsti prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // GarP_2,43.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5497: raktasya darśane daṣṭe āturā strī bhaved yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5498: caturthe 'hni padādīṃśca tyaktvā snātvā viśudhyati // GarP_2,43.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5500: snātvāsnātvāspṛśedenaṃ tataḥ śudhyet sa āturaḥ // GarP_2,43.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5501: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde śuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5511: na teṣāṃ syānnava śrāddhaṃ na saṃskāraḥ sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:5512: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśoktāni na bhavanti ca tānyapi // GarP_2,44.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5516: ekādaśīṃ samāsādya śuklapakṣe ca kāśyapa // GarP_2,44.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5518: daśa piṇḍān ghṛtāktāṃśca darbheṣu madhusaṃyutān // GarP_2,44.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5519: yajñopavīti satilān dhyāyan viṣṇuṃ yamaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5521: uddhṛtya miśritān paścāt tīrthe 'bhmaḥ su viniḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup2_u:5522: kṣipan saṃkīrtayennāma gotraṃ ca mṛtakasya ca // GarP_2,44.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5528: apare 'hani madhyāhne yamaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathārcayet // GarP_2,44.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5532: pretaṃ yamaṃ ca viṣṇuṃ ca smaran śrāddhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,44.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5534: pṛthagvā daśa piṇḍāṃśca pañca dadyāt krameṇa tu // GarP_2,44.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5535: prathamaṃ viṣṇave dadyādbrahmaṇe ca śivāya ca /
GP12garup2_u:5536: sabhṛtyāya śivāyātha pretāyāpi ca pañcamam // GarP_2,44.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5537: nāma gotraṃ smaret tasya viṣṇuśabdaṃ prakīrtayet /
GP12garup2_u:5541: dadyādannaṃ dvijānāṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5542: evaṃ śiṣṭatamaṃ vipraṃ hariṇyena prapūjayet // GarP_2,44.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5544: anuvrajya dvijān paścāt tyaktāmbho dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // GarP_2,44.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5555: arcayet tāṃ sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiścandanenaca // GarP_2,44.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5561: dhenuṃ dattvā tato brūyāt prīyatāṃ nāgarāḍiti // GarP_2,44.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5564: pretatvānmocayet tāṃstu svargamārgaṃ nayet ca // GarP_2,44.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5565: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde durmaraṇe kāryākāryakriyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5573: ekoddiṣṭaṃ na kuryātāṃ pratyabdaṃ tau tu pārvaṇam // GarP_2,45.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5574: yadā tvanyataraḥ sāgniḥ putro vāpyathavā pitā /
GP12garup2_u:5575: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tatra kuryātāṃ kṣetrajaurasau // GarP_2,45.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5576: anagnayaḥ sāgnayo vā putrā vā pitaro 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5577: ekoddiṣṭaṃ sutaiḥ kāryaṃ kṣayāha iti kecana // GarP_2,45.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5578: darśakāle kṣayo yasya pretapakṣe 'tha vā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5579: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tasya sarvaiḥ sutairapi // GarP_2,45.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5582: bahirlūnāḥ sakṛllanāḥ śrāddhaṃ vṛddhimṛte sadā // GarP_2,45.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5583: kartavye pārvaṇe śrāddhe āśaucaṃ yadi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5585: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ prajāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5586: māsenyasmin tithau tasyāṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ tadaiva hi // GarP_2,45.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5589: ekakāle gatā sūnāṃ bahūnāmatha vā dvayoḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5590: tantreṇa śrapaṇaṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ kuryāt pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,45.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5591: dadyāt pūrvaṃ mṛtasyādau dvitīyasya tataḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5592: tṛtīyasya tataḥ kuryāt saṃnipāte tvayaṃ vidhiḥ (kramaḥ) // GarP_2,45.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5594: tārayitvā pitṝn sarvān prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_2,45.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5597: yadā māso na vijñāto vijñātaṃ dinameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5598: tadā mārgaśire māsi māghe vā taddinaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,45.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5600: prasthānadinamāsau tu grāhyau śrāddhe mayoditau // GarP_2,45.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5601: prasthānasyāpi na jñātau dinamāsau yadā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5604: tadānīmapi tau grāhyau pūrvavat tu mṛtāhike // GarP_2,45.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5605: gṛhasthe proṣite yacca kaścittu mriyate gṛhe /
GP12garup2_u:5608: āśaucaṃ gṛhiṇasteṣāṃ na dravyādestadā bhavet // GarP_2,45.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5610: samāpanīyaṃ tatrāpi śrāddhaṃ gṛhītu dūrataḥ // GarP_2,45.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5611: dātrā boktrā ca na jñātaṃ sūtakaṃ mṛtakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5614: bhoktureva tadā doṣo nānyo dātā praduṣyati // GarP_2,45.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5618: sarvān pitṛgaṇān samyak sahaivoddiśya yojayet // GarP_2,45.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5622: dattvā tu dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā namaskārairvisarjayet // GarP_2,45.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5629: mātāmahebhyaśca tathā dadyāditthaṃ krameṇa tu // GarP_2,45.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5631: patiputrānvitāḥ sādhvyo yoṣito 'ṣṭau ca bhāvayet // GarP_2,45.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5634: nityaṃ daivañca vṛddhiñca kāmyaṃ naimittikaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5636: iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya kimanyatparipṛcchasi // GarP_2,45.34 //
GP12garup2_u:5637: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pratyābdikādiśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5642: bhogāḥ saukhyāti rūpañca balaṃ buddhaiḥ parākramaḥ // GarP_2,46.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5643: satyaṃ puṇyavatāṃ deva jāyate 'tra paratra ca /
GP12garup2_u:5644: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ vedavākyaṃ na cānyathā // GarP_2,46.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5645: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayāte nānṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5646: kṣamā jayati na krodho viṣṇurjayati nāsuraḥ // GarP_2,46.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5652: tanme vada suraśreṣṭha samāsenāpi kāṅkṣitam // GarP_2,46.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5655: jāyante lakṣaṇairyaistutāni me śṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,46.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5657: iha pracchannapāpānāṃ śāstā vaivasvato yamaḥ // GarP_2,46.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5659: yātanābhirvimuktā ye yānti te jīvasantatīm // GarP_2,46.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5660: gatvā mānuṣabhāve tu pāpacihnā bhavanti te /
GP12garup2_u:5661: tānyahaṃ tava cihnāni kathayiṣye khagottama // GarP_2,46.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5662: soḍhvā vai yātanāḥ sarvā gatvā vaivasvatakṣayam /
GP12garup2_u:5665: brahmahā jāyate kuṣṭhī śyāvadantaśca madyapaḥ // GarP_2,46.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5669: kharo vai bahuyājī syātkāko nirmantrabhojanāt // GarP_2,46.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5673: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkukkaro bhavet // GarP_2,46.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5676: mṛto vānaratāṃ yāti tanmukho gaṇḍavān bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5677: adattvā bhakṣyamaśrāti anapatyo bhavettu saḥ // GarP_2,46.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5681: aprāptayauvanāṃ sevan bhavetsarpa iti śrutiḥ // GarP_2,46.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5685: ayonigo vṛko hi syādulūkaḥ krayavañcanāt // GarP_2,46.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5692: yadvā tadvāpi pārakyaṃ svalpaṃ vā harate bahu /
GP12garup2_u:5693: hṛtvā vai yonimāpnoti tiraścāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,46.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5697: evaṃ duṣkṛtakarmā hi bhuktvā ca narakānkramāt /
GP12garup2_u:5700: jāyate nātra sandehaḥ samībhūte śubhāśubhe // GarP_2,46.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5703: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇā jñānamāyuḥ sukhaṃ dhṛtiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5704: dhāraṇā preraṇaṃ duḥ khaṃ mithyāhaṅkāra eva ca // GarP_2,46.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5708: purā yathā mayā proktaṃ tava jantorhi lakṣaṇam // GarP_2,46.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5714: yā dṛśyante vainateya tatsarvaṃ karmajaṃ phalam // GarP_2,46.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5716: patedvai narake bhūyo tasyottāro na vidyate // GarP_2,46.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5717: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe jīvasya śubhāśubhagatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5722: dānaṃ dānasya māhātmyaṃ vaitaraṇyāḥ pramāṇakam // GarP_2,47.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5724: yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma yamamārge mahāsarit /
GP12garup2_u:5728: kvāthyate satvaraṃ toyaṃ pātramadhye ghṛtaṃ yathā /
GP12garup2_u:5729: krimibhiḥ saṅkulaṃ pūyaṃ vajratuṇḍaiḥ samāvṛtam // GarP_2,47.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5732: udyānti dvādaśādityāḥ pralayānte tathā hi te /
GP12garup2_u:5733: tapanti tatra vai martyāḥ kranda mānāstu pāpinaḥ // GarP_2,47.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5734: hā bhrātaḥ putra tāteti pralapanti muhurmuhuḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5735: vicaranti nimajjanti glāniṃ gacchanti jantavaḥ // GarP_2,47.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5737: taranti gopradānena tvanyathā ca patanti te // GarP_2,47.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5738: māṃ narā ye 'vamanyante cācāryaṃ gurumeva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5739: vṛddhānanyāṃścāpi mūḍhāsteṣāṃ vāsastu tatra vai // GarP_2,47.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5741: parityajanti ye mūḍhāsteṣāṃ vāsastu santatam // GarP_2,47.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5744: pacyante tatra madhye tu krandamānāstu pāpinaḥ // GarP_2,47.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5747: brāhmaṇāya pratīśrutya yamārthaṃ na dadāti tam /
GP12garup2_u:5748: āhūya nāsti yo brūyāttasya vāsastu tatra vai // GarP_2,47.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5754: godhanasya tṛṣārtasya vāpyā bhedaṃ karoti yaḥ // GarP_2,47.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5757: ete vasanti satataṃ mā vicāraṃ kṛthāḥ kvacit /
GP12garup2_u:5758: kṛpaṇo nāstikaḥ kṣudraḥ sa tasyāṃ nivasetkhaga // GarP_2,47.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5762: kṛtaghno garbhasantāpī vaitaraṇyāṃ sa majjati // GarP_2,47.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5768: yadā tadā bhavedvāpi śrāddhā dānaṃ prati dhruvam // GarP_2,47.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5770: anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ // GarP_2,47.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5772: kṛṣṇāṃ vā pāṭalāṃ vāpi kuryādvaitaraṇīṃ śubhām // GarP_2,47.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5783: tartukāmo dadāmyenāṃ tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇīṃ namaḥ // GarP_2,47.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5784: gāvo me agrataḥ santu gāvo me santu pārśvataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5785: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // GarP_2,47.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5787: sadakṣiṇā mayā dattā tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇīnamaḥ // GarP_2,47.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5790: pucchaṃ saṃgṛhya dhenvāśca agre kṛtvā tu vai vdijam /
GP12garup2_u:5791: dhenuke tvaṃ pratīkṣasva yamadvāre mahābhaye // GarP_2,47.34 //
GP12garup2_u:5793: anuvrajettu gacchantaṃ sarvaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ nayet // GarP_2,47.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5794: evaṃ kṛte vainateya sā saritsutarā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5798: mṛtasyaiva tu yaddānaṃ parokṣe tatsamaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5799: svahastena tato deyaṃ mṛte kaḥ kasya dāsyatī // GarP_2,47.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5801: asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiraṃ karma samācaret // GarP_2,47.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5802: avaśyameva yāsyanti prāṇāḥ prāghuṇi (ghūrṇi) kā iva // GarP_2,47.40 //
GP12garup2_u:5803: itīdamuktaṃ tava pakṣirāja viḍambanaṃ jantugaṇasya sarvam /
GP12garup2_u:5804: pretasya mokṣāya tadauddhvandaihikaṃ hitāya lokasya carecchubhāya tu // GarP_2,47.41 //
GP12garup2_u:5811: maraṇaṃ janma ca tathā pretatvañcaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,47.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5812: mayā proktaṃ vai muktyai nidānaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5815: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayati nānṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5816: kṣamā jayati na krodho viṣṇurjayati nāsurāḥ // GarP_2,47.46 //
GP12garup2_u:5818: yeṣāmeva sthirā buddhirna teṣāṃ durgatirbhavet // GarP_2,47.47 //
GP12garup2_u:5827: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gatopi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5828: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraṃ śuciḥ // GarP_2,47.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5829: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpu- uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmakādṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde karmavipākādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5833: ye martyaloke nivasanti mānavāste sarvajātau nidhanaṃ prayānti /
GP12garup2_u:5834: kāle svakīye nijapuṇyasaṃkhyayā vadanti lāka kathasva tanme // GarP_2,48.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5836: kenaiva puṇyena mudaṃ prayānti tiṣṭhanti kenaiva kulaṃ balaṃ vayaḥ // GarP_2,48.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5838: śrutvātha devo garuḍaṃ tvavocat smṛtvā vapuḥ karmabhayañca rūpam /
GP12garup2_u:5839: sṛṣṭā dharā yena carācaraṃ jagatsa yena śastā vihito yamo vibhuḥ // GarP_2,48.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5842: praviśyacāṅguṣṭhasame sa tatra vai taṃ prāpya dehaṃ svamandiram? // GarP_2,48.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5843: gṛhītapāśo rudate punaḥ punardeśe supuṇye dvija dehasaṃsthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5844: devendrapūjā pitṛdevatṛptidaṃ mohānna ceṣṭaṃ na ca puttrasantatiḥ // GarP_2,48.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5845: na me 'sti bandhuryamamārgagāmino mayā na kṛtyaṃ dvijadehalipsayā /
GP12garup2_u:5847: prāptaṃ suratnaṃ karasaṃsthitaṃ gataṃ dehankvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5848: yaḥ kṣattriyo bāhubalena saṃyuge lalāṭadeśādrudhiraṃ mukhe papau /
GP12garup2_u:5849: tatsomapānaṃ hi kṛtaṃ mahāmakhe jīvanmṛtaḥ so 'pi hi yāti muktik // GarP_2,48.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5851: śastraṃ gṛhītvā samare ripūṇāṃ yaḥ saṃmukhaṃ yāti sa muktapāpaḥ // GarP_2,48.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5852: kṣattrānvayo vāpi viśonvayo vā śūdrānvayo vāpi hi nīcavarṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5854: upadruteṣveṣu parāṅmukho yaḥ syustasya devāḥ sakalāḥ parāṅmukhāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5855: tilodakaṃ naiva pibanti pūrve hutaṃ na gṛhṇāti hutāśanopi tat // GarP_2,48.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5856: dveṣādbhayādvā samare samāgate śastraṃ gṛhītvā parasainyasaṃmukhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5857: na yāti pakṣīndra mṛśca paścātkṣāttraṃ balaṃ tasya gataṃ tathaiva /
GP12garup2_u:5858: dvijāya dattvā kanakaṃ mahīmimāṃ bhūyaḥ sa paścādbhavatīha loke // GarP_2,48.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5859: dānaṃ pradattaṃ grahaṇe dvijendre snānaṃ kṛtaṃ tena sadā sutīrthe /
GP12garup2_u:5860: gatvā gayāyāṃ pitṛpiṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ sadā yo mriyate tu yuddhe // GarP_2,48.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5861: yaḥ kṣāttradehantu vihāya śocate raṇāṅgaṇe svāmivadhe ca gograhe /
GP12garup2_u:5862: strībālaghāte pathi sārthahetave mayā svakośaṃ na hataṃ na pātitam // GarP_2,48.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5863: vaiśyaḥ svakarmāṇi viśocate tadā gṛhītapāśo na mayāpi sañcitam /
GP12garup2_u:5864: satyaṃ na coktaṃ kraya vikrayeṇa mohādvimūḍhena kuṭumbahetave // GarP_2,48.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5865: śūdraṃ vapuḥ prāpya yaśaskaraṃ sadā dānaṃ dvijebhyo na kṛtaṃ dvijārcanam /
GP12garup2_u:5867: jalāśayo naiva kṛto dharātale asaṃskṛto vipravaro na saṃskṛtaḥ // GarP_2,48.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5868: tyaktvā svakarmāṇi madena susthitaṃ mayā sutīrthe svavapurna cojjhitam /
GP12garup2_u:5869: dharmorjito naiva na devapūjanaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā caiva vimuktihetave // GarP_2,48.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5871: marunmayaṃ dehamime viśanti naivehamānāḥ pathi dharmasaṃkule // GarP_2,48.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5872: parasparaṃ dharmakṛntaṃ svakīyaṃ sampādya lakṣyaṃ pathi sañcarantsvam /
GP12garup2_u:5873: pakṣīndra vākyāni śṛṇuṣva tāni manoramāṇi pravadanti yāni // GarP_2,48.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5874: sārā hi lokeṣu bhavettrilokī dvīpeṣu sarveṣu ca jambukākhyam /
GP12garup2_u:5875: deśeṣu sarveṣvapi devadeśaḥ jīveṣu sarveṣu manuṣya eva // GarP_2,48.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5876: varṇāśca catvāra iha praśastāḥ varṇeṣu dharmiṣṭhanarāḥ praśastāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5877: dharmeṇa saukhyaṃ samupaiti sarvaṃ jñānaṃ samāpnoti mahāpathe sthitaḥ // GarP_2,48.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5878: dehaṃ parityajya yadā gatāyuḥ pakṣin sthito 'haṃ kṛmikīṭasaṃsthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5880: sarvaṃ vijānāti hi garbhasaṃsthito jātaśca sadyastadidañca vismaret /
GP12garup2_u:5881: yaccintitaṃ garbhasamāgatena vai bālo yuvā vṛddhavayā babhūva // GarP_2,48.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5882: mohādvināṣṭaṃ yadi garbhacintitaṃ smṛtaṃ punarmṛtyugate cadehe /
GP12garup2_u:5883: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ gataṃ smṛtaṃ punargarbhagate ca dehe // GarP_2,48.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5884: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ punarmayā svakośe paravañcanaṃ kṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5885: dyūtaiśchalenāpi ca cauryavṛttyā dharmaṃ vyatikramya śarīrarakṣaṇe // GarP_2,48.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5886: kṛcchreṇa lakṣmīḥ samupārjitā svayaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ manasepsitaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:5888: somagrahe sūryasamāgamepi vā na sevitaṃ tīrthavariṣṭhamuttamam /
GP12garup2_u:5889: kośaṃ svakīyaṃ malamūtrapūritaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5890: mayā na dṛṣṭā na natā na pūjitā traivikramī mūrtiriha sthitā bhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:5891: prabhāsanātho na ca bhaktisaṃstuto dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5892: gatvā variṣṭhe bhuvi tīrthasannidhau dhanaṃ na dattaṃ viduṣāṃ kare mayā /
GP12garup2_u:5893: āplutya dehaṃ vidhinā dvije gurau dihinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5894: na mātṛpūjā na ca viṣṇuśaṅkarau gaṇeśacaṇaḍyau na ca bhāskaro 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5896: labdhā mayā mānavadevatopamā mohādgatā sarvamidañca pārthiva /
GP12garup2_u:5897: gatiṃ na vīkṣeta sa vai vimūḍhadhīrdehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5899: muktiṃ samāyānti manuṣyaloke vasanti ye dharmaratāḥ sudeśe // GarP_2,48.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5901: hā daiva hā daiva iti smaran vai dhanaṃ na dattaṃ svayamarjitaṃ yat // GarP_2,48.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5902: na bhūmidānaṃ na ca gopradānaṃ na vāridānaṃ na ca vastradānam /
GP12garup2_u:5903: phalaṃ satāmbūlavilepanaṃ vā tvayā na dattaṃ bhuvi śocase katham // GarP_2,48.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5904: pitā mṛtaste ca pitāmahaḥ sā yayā dhṛto vāpyudare svakīye /
GP12garup2_u:5905: mṛto 'pyasau bandhujanaḥ samasto dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sarvamidaṃ gatāyaḥ // GarP_2,48.34 //
GP12garup2_u:5906: kośaṃ tvadīyaṃ jvalitañca vahninā puttrairgṛhīto dhanadhānya sañcayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5907: subhāṣitaṃ dharmacayaṃ kṛtañca yattadeva gacchettava pṛṣṭhasaṃstham // GarP_2,48.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5908: na dṛśyate ko 'pi mṛtaḥ samāgato rājā yatirvā dvijapuṅgavo 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5909: yo vai mṛtaḥ sāhasikaḥ sa martyako nāśaṃ yo 'pi dharātale sthitaḥ // GarP_2,48.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5910: evaṃ gaṇāste bruvate sakinnarā dhairyaṃ samālambya vipādapūritaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5911: śrutvā gaṇānāṃ vacanaṃ mahādbhutaṃ bravīti pakṣīndra manuṣyatāṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,48.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5913: vāṇī kalatraṃ madhurārthabhāṣiṇī snānaṃ sutīrthe ca subandhavargaḥ // GarP_2,48.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5914: karārpitaṃ yatsukṛtaṃ samastaṃ svargastadā syāttava kiṅkaropamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5915: yo dharmavān prāpsyati so 'tisaukhyaṃ pāpī samastaṃ vividhañca duḥkham // GarP_2,48.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5916: yo dharmaśīlo jitamānaroṣo vidyāvinīto na paropatāpī /
GP12garup2_u:5917: svadāratuṣṭaḥ paradāradūraḥsa vai naro no bhuvi vandanīyaḥ // GarP_2,48.40 //
GP12garup2_u:5919: māsopavāsī ca pativratā caṣaḍ jīvaloke mama vandanīyāḥ // GarP_2,48.41 //
GP12garup2_u:5920: evaṃ samācārayuto naro 'pi vāpīṃ sakūpāṃ sajalaṃ taḍāgam /
GP12garup2_u:5921: prapāśubhaṃ hṛdgṛhadevamandiraṃ kṛtaṃ nareṇaiva sa dharmauttamaḥ // GarP_2,48.42 //
GP12garup2_u:5922: varṣāśanaṃ vedavide ca dattaṃ kanyāvivāhastvṛṇamocanaṃ dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5923: bhūmiḥ sukṛṣṭāpi tṛṣārtihetostadevametaṃ sukṛtat samastam // GarP_2,48.43 //
GP12garup2_u:5924: adhyāyamenaṃ sukṛtasya sāraṃ śṛṇoti gāyatyapi bhāvaśuddhyā /
GP12garup2_u:5925: sa vai kulīnaḥ sa ca dharmayukto viśvālayaṃ yāti paraṃ sa nūnam // GarP_2,48.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5926: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde manuṣyasya sukhaduḥ khaprāpakadharmādharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5935: jāyante ca mriyante ca teṣāmanto na vidyate // GarP_2,49.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5936: sadā duḥ khāturā eva na sakhī vidyate kkacit /
GP12garup2_u:5937: kenopāyena mokṣeśa mucyante vada me prabho // GarP_2,49.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5939: śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi /
GP12garup2_u:5942: sarvajñaḥ sarvakartā ca sarveśo nirmalo 'dvayaḥ // GarP_2,49.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5954: sukṛtānmā navo bhūtvā jñānī cenmokṣamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5956: na mānuṣaṃ vinānyatra tattvajñānantu labhyate // GarP_2,49.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5960: yastāra yati nātmānaṃ tasmātpāpataro 'tra kaḥ // GarP_2,49.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5962: na vettyātmahitaṃ yastu sa bhavedbrahmaghātakaḥ // GarP_2,49.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5963: vinā dehena kasyāpi puruṣārtho na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:5968: punaḥ śubhāśubhaṃ karma na śarīraṃ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,49.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5976: gatvā nirauṣadhaṃ deśaṃ vyādhimthaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati // GarP_2,49.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5984: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jano hanta na vetti hitamātmanaḥ // GarP_2,49.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5986: loko mohasurāṃ pītvā na bibheti kadācana // GarP_2,49.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5992: viśvastaśca bhayasthāne hā naraḥ ko na hanyate // GarP_2,49.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5996: anarthe cārthavijñānaḥ svamarthaṃ yo na vetti saḥ // GarP_2,49.33 //
GP12garup2_u:6002: āmakuṃbha ivāṃbhaḥ stho viśīrṇo na vibhāvyate // GarP_2,49.36 //
GP12garup2_u:6006: śuṣyate sāgarajalaṃ śarīrasya ca kā kathā // GarP_2,49.38 //
GP12garup2_u:6007: apatyaṃ me kalatraṃ me dhanaṃ me bāndhavāśca me /
GP12garup2_u:6008: jalpantamiti martyājaṃ hanti kālavṛko balāt // GarP_2,49.39 //
GP12garup2_u:6012: na hi mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣeta kṛtaṃ vāpyatha vākṛtam // GarP_2,49.41 //
GP12garup2_u:6014: adhiṣṭhito mṛtyuśatruṃ trātāraṃ kiṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,49.42 //
GP12garup2_u:6021: duḥ khamūlaṃ hi saṃsāraḥ sa yasyāsti sa duḥ khitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6022: tasya tyāgaḥ kṛto yena sa sukhī nāparaḥ kvacit // GarP_2,49.46 //
GP12garup2_u:6031: māṃsalubdho yathā matsyo lohaśaṅkuṃ na paśyati /
GP12garup2_u:6032: sukhalubdhastathā dehī yamavādhāṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,49.51 //
GP12garup2_u:6034: kukṣipūraṇaniṣṭhā ye te narā nārakāḥ khaga // GarP_2,49.52 //
GP12garup2_u:6036: jñānavānmānavaḥ prokto jñānahīnaḥ paśuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,49.53 //
GP12garup2_u:6040: jāyante ca mriyante ca hā hantājñānamohitāḥ // GarP_2,49.55 //
GP12garup2_u:6041: tasmātsaṅgaḥ sadā tyājyaḥ sacettyaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12garup2_u:6042: mahadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ santaḥ saṅgasya bheṣajam // GarP_2,49.56 //
GP12garup2_u:6044: yasya nāsti naraḥ so 'ndhaḥ kathaṃ na syādamārgagaḥ // GarP_2,49.57 //
GP12garup2_u:6046: na jānanti paraṃ dharmaṃ vṛthā naśyanti dāmbhikāḥ // GarP_2,49.58 //
GP12garup2_u:6060: caranti gardabhādyāśca viraktāste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.65 //
GP12garup2_u:6062: mṛdbhasmavāsī nityaṃ śvā sa kiṃ mukto bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,49.66 //
GP12garup2_u:6068: na pibanti mahītoyaṃ vratinaste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.69 //
GP12garup2_u:6081: anyathā paramaṃ tattvaṃ janāḥ kliśyanti cānyathā /
GP12garup2_u:6082: anyathā śāstrasadbhāvo vyākhyāṃ kurvanti cānyathā // GarP_2,49.76 //
GP12garup2_u:6086: na jānanti paraṃ tattvaṃ darvī pākarasaṃ yathā // GarP_2,49.78 //
GP12garup2_u:6087: śiro vahati puṣpāṇi gandhaṃ jānāti nāsikā /
GP12garup2_u:6090: gopaḥ kakṣāgate cchāge kūpaṃ paśyati durmatiḥ // GarP_2,49.80 //
GP12garup2_u:6094: ataḥ prajñāvatāṃ śāstraṃ tattvajñānasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_2,49.82 //
GP12garup2_u:6102: tattvajñasya tathā tārkṣya na śāstreṇa prayojanam // GarP_2,49.86 //
GP12garup2_u:6104: jñānādeva hi kaivalyaṃ nānyathā vinatātmajaḥ // GarP_2,49.87 //
GP12garup2_u:6106: tathaiva sarvakarmāṇi jñānameva hi kāraṇam // GarP_2,49.88 //
GP12garup2_u:6114: samaṃ tattvaṃ na jānanti dvaitāddvaitavivarjitam // GarP_2,49.92 //
GP12garup2_u:6115: dve pade bandhamokṣāya namameti mameti ca /
GP12garup2_u:6117: tatkarma yanna bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimuktidā /
GP12garup2_u:6136: chindyādasaṃgaśastreṇa spṛhāṃ dehe 'nu yā ca tam // GarP_2,49.103 //
GP12garup2_u:6143: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma brahmāhaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12garup2_u:6146: yaḥ prayāti tyajandehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_2,49.108 //
GP12garup2_u:6148: sudhiyastāṃ gatiṃ yānti tānahaṃ kathayāmi te // GarP_2,49.109 //
GP12garup2_u:6150: dvandvairvimuktāḥ sukhaduḥ khasaṃjñairgacchantyamūḍhāḥ padamavyayaṃ tat // GarP_2,49.110 //
GP12garup2_u:6152: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.111 //
GP12garup2_u:6154: pūrṇadṛṣṭiḥ prasannātmā sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.112 //
GP12garup2_u:6156: muktikṣetreṣu mriyate sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.113 //
GP12garup2_u:6157: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantika /
GP12garup2_u:6158: purī dvāravatī jñeyāḥ saptaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ // GarP_2,49.114 //
GP12garup2_u:6159: iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya mokṣadharmaṃ sanātanam /
GP12garup2_u:6161: mokṣaṃ gacchanti tattvajñā dhārmikāḥ svargatiṃ narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6162: pāpino durgatiṃ yānti saṃsaranti khagādayaḥ // GarP_2,49.116 //
GP12garup2_u:6167: ityuktvā viṣṇumāmantrya sa gataḥ kaśyapāśramam // GarP_2,49.118 //
GP12garup2_u:6168: sadyo dehāntaraṃ yāti yathā yāti vilambataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6171: mārīco 'pi mudaṃ lebhe śrutvā vākyaṃ ramāpateḥ // GarP_2,49.120 //
GP12garup2_u:6177: mayā tu bhavatāṃ proktaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ hareridam // GarP_2,49.123 //
GP12garup2_u:6178: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo yo vāpyabhidadhāti ca /
GP12garup2_u:6179: ihāmutra ca loke sa sarvatra sukhamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.124 //
GP12garup2_u:6181: asya śravaṇataḥ puṇyaṃ tanmukto jāyate tataḥ // GarP_2,49.125 //
GP12garup2_u:6184: bhajata jitahṛṣīkāḥ kṛṣṇamenaṃ munīśaṃ samajani bata yasmādgīḥ sudhāsāradhārā /
GP12garup2_u:6185: pṛṣatamapi yadīyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ nipīya śrutipuṭaculukena prāpnuyādātmanaikyam // GarP_2,49.127 //
GP12garup2_u:6192: sa munirapi niśamya śaunakendro bahutaramānayati sma cātmani svam // GarP_2,49.130 //
GP12garup2_u:6197: śṛṇvatāṃ kāmanāpūraṃ śrotavyaṃ sarvadaiva hi // GarP_2,49.132 //
GP12garup2_u:6205: vihāya yātanāṃ ghorāṃ dhūtapāpo divaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,49.136 //
GP12garup2_u:6206: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe mokṣopāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:6207: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyo dharmakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ
